chug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis ta/ ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchas/ byin gyi sa nga rlangus pa ma
mchas so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nyi shu gsum pa/// bcom ldan 'das gang yang 'di ltar 'di lta ste/
byang chub sams dang 'a zhes chos kyi brdar bgyib dang/ chos su gdags pa de yang gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dag/ rnam pa ra shes pa 'am/ mig gam/
nab 'om/ sna 'tsha/ lce ga/ lus tsam/ yide dam gzugs sam/ sgra bam/ dro 'og/ re 'am/ rag gam/ chos sam/ mgo gi rnam par shes pa 'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes ra
@#/ dmasna'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lce'i rnam par shas pa 'am/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ tshade kyi rnam par shes pa la// mig gi 'dus rta rag pa 'ad// rna pa'i
'dus darag pa 'am/ stsa'i 'dus tAreg pa 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te rig pa 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
'tsha tshor ba 'am/ rna bu'i 'dus par g pa 'i rgyun gyis tshor ba 'am/ sna'i 'dus te rig pa'i skyon gyis tshor ba 'am/ lcal 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba las/ 'dus kyi 'dug redu rnga'i
rgyan gyis tsher ba 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ sa'i bcas pasum/ chu'i khams sam/ ma'i khams ba ma rlung gi khams ma/ na mkha'i khams
sam/ rnam pa ra bas nga 'i khams sa ma/ ma rig pa ngam/ 'du byed dam// rnam nga ra shes pa 'am/ ming dang gzugs sam/ skye mched drug gam/ rig pa 'am tsho ra nga lta ba
srid pa 'am/ 'be 1 srid pa 'am: skya pa 'am/ rga shi 'amo/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzed pa nga rol tu phyin pa 'ab/ ba rtson
'grus kyi pha rol ngan pa las/ bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ nang stong pa de dam/ phyi stong pa nyid du// nang stong pa nyid dam/
stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chan po stong pa nyid dus/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'dus pa stong pa nyid dam/
grog ma dang tha ma med pa stongapa nyid dam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dag/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ mi dmigs pa
stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po yodapa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bitadi stong pa nyid dam// dngos po ni dpa'i ngo thi nyid stongang nyid dam/ dran nga rta bar gzhag pa rnams sum/ yang dag par spong
ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sa ma/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sa ma/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/
'phags pa'i bden po rnamos sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/
mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa 'a sgo stengang nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa 'ag/ ma na par shes pa rnams sam/ jing nga
'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su/ ma 'jigs pa rnams lam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam// byams pa chen po
lam snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis brjod du ma mchis pa ste// chos su gdags pa tsam du bas so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
dper na rmi lam zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gdags kyang brjod du ma mchis so// sgyu ma zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// sgra brnyan zhes bgyi ba'i mnge nu gang gis kyang
wabarjod du mu mchi'i so// mig yor zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// smig rgyu zhes bgyi ba'i na nga ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// nu zla nye bgyi
ba'i monge ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchige so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dang ra
na nam mkha' zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchige so// sa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// chu zhes bgyi ba'i ming gang gis kyang brjod du
ma mchire bas// mi zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// rlung zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming ni/
gang gi kyang brjod du ma mchis so// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gong gos kyang brjod du ma mchis so// gzhan zab yin pa de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba'i mi ngo migang gis kyang
brjod du ma mchibs so// chos nyid ces bgyi ba'i mang ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// chos kyi dbyangs zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// chos kyi
gnas nyid ces bgyi ba'i mang ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// ches skyon med pa nyipasdus bgyi ba'i yang ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// yang dag pa'i 'o thang zhes bgyi ba'i
ma ni gung gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi bang he re nage/nga gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i mang
ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ baphrod pa pA rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni/
gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i yong zhigang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin zhes bgyi ba'i nga
ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// tshul khrims zhes bgyi ba'i mang ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// ting 'dzin ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma 8 se so/
shes rab ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// rnam par grol ba dus bgyi ba'i mngoni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// rnam par grol lo shes mthong
ba zhes bgyi ba'i sang zhig gnad kyang brjed du ma mchis so// rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming nag gis kyang brjodadu ma mchis so// rgyun du zhugs
ba'i chos zhes bgyi bra'i mang ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// lan cig phyir 'ong bu zhes bgyi ba'i mnge ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos/
zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gab kyang brjod du ma mchis so// phyi'i ma 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni bong gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i chog[] zhes bgyi ba'i ming zhi
gang gis kyang brjod du na mchis so/ dgra bcom pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang yarjod du ma ma rmis so// dag pa rtsom parta chos zhes bkyi ba'i mi de ni gang gis kyang brjod/
du ma mchis so// kyangu su Tas rgyas zhes bgyi ba'i ming gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// rang sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bgyi ba'i mong ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis bo/
b+he byang chub sems dung bu zhes bgyi ba'i tshang ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma nurmis so// byang chub sems dpa'i chos zhes bgyi ba 'a mang ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// yang dag/
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba'i ming su gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis te/ ang dag par rdzogs pa da ra ngas rgyas kyi chos zhes bgyi ba'i ming la nga dag ga
'am 2 ma dge ba 'a// kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa 'am/ kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa ma/ rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bang ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdug
gam/ bdag ma mchis pa 'an/ zhi ba 'am/ ma zhi ba 'am/ dben pa 'a/ mi dbon pa 'am/ dngos bo 'am/ dngos po ma mtshog pa gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis
pas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gas don gyi dbang de lta bu mthong ba'i slad du/ de skad du bdag gis chos thams cad kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib ba ma mthong bzhin du 'di lta ste
byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi bar ming du gdags pa ni bdag gi 'gyod pa ba'agyur ro zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
de ltar na nga de ni gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchi// byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis pa/ da ci'i slad du zhin/ ming da ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis
thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'dus de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po la shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa brjod de/ rnam
pa 'di dag dang/ tshul 'di dag dang/ mtshanam 'di dag gis bstan pa'i tsho/ sems zhum pa 'a la 'gyur/ lo81su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing/ 'gyod pa ma mchis la// ma
'jigs mi sdang skrag par ma 'gyur na/ byang chu sa ma dang 'asams dpa' chen po de ni nges par phyir ma ldeg pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas par rtogs
bar bgyi sa/ gnas pa zhes bgyi ba'i gnas pa ma mchis pa 'i tshul lo// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' las dpa' chen po shas rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin nga la spyod pa 'di tsho/ des gzugs la gnas bya ra ma bgyi'o// des tshor ba la gnas bar ma bgyi'o// das 'du shes la gnas par ma bgyi'o// des 'du byed la gnas par mi
bgyi'o// des rnam par shas snga la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des mig la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des rna ba la gnas bar mi bgyi'o// des sna la gnas par ma bgyi'o// des
lce la gnas par bgyi'o// des lus la gnas nga ra ma bgyi'o// dus yid la gnas par ma bgyi'o// des gzugs la gnas par ma bgyi'o// des spyi la gnas par ma
bgyi'o// des dri la gnas pa ra mi bgyi'o// des rol gnas par mi bgyi'o// des reg la gnas par m bgyi'o// des chos la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des mag gi
rnam par shes pa la gnas pa ra mi bgyi'o// des mtha'i rnam par shes pa la gnas par ma bgyigo/ des sna'i rnam par shes pa la gnas pa' sa bgyi'o// des lce'i rnam par
0/ shes pa la gnas par ma bgyi'o// dus lus kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas par ma bgyig/ des yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas/
par ma bgyi'o// des rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas par ma bgyi'o// des sna' 'dus te'og pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des lca'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas par ma bgyi'o//
des rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rgyu gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// dus snya' 'dus rig pa'i rgyun gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des lce 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
lo// dos mgo ga 'dus rta rag ba'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o//
tshor ba la gnas pa ra mi bgyi'o// des lus kyi 'dus tareg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas bar ma bgyi'o//
des sa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi// dos chu'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des ma'i khams la gnas pa'am bgyi'o// des rlung gi khams la gnas bar ma bgyi'o//
des nam mkha'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des ma rig pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des 'du byed la gnas
par ma bgyi'o// des rnam par shes pa la gnas pa ram bgyi'o// des ming dang gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des skye mched drug la gnas par mi bgyi'o/
spro dis reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des tshor ba la gnas par ma bgyi'o// des sred pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// dres len pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des srid pa la gnas pa'i
bgyi'o// des skyo ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des rga shi la gzhas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong
ste 2 gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs ma lags/ gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs

so// tshor ba tshor bas stong sku/ tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba ma lags/ tshor ba las gungan yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang
tshor ba'o// 'du shes 'du shes kyis stong ste/ 'dushes kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes ma lags/ 'du shes las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shos
nyidakyang stong ba nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes so/ 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ste/ 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed ma lags/ 'du byed las gud na yang stong
panyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ste/ rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam bar
shes pa ma lags/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam
grangs des na/ byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa 'i tsho/ des gzugs la gnas bar mi bgyi'o// des tshor ba la gnas par mi
bgyi'o// das 'du shes la gnas par ma bgyi'o// des 'du byedal gnas par ma bgyi'o// des rnam par shes pa la gnas par ma bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das da yang 'di ltar
mig mig gis stong ste/ mig gi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mig ma lags/ mig las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ mig de kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang mig go
na pa rna bas stong ste/ rna ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rna ba ma lags/ rna ba las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rna ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong ba nyid kyang rna ba'o//
sna snas stong// sna'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sna ma lags/ sna las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sna nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang sna'o// lce lces
stong sku/ lce'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang lce ma lags/ lce las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ lce nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang lce'o// 'dus
lus kyis stong ste/ lus kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang lus ma 'gas/ lus 'bas gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ lus nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang lus so//
ide yid kyis stong ste/ yid kyi stong pa nyid gang 'a gas pa de yang yade ma lags/ yade las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ yide nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang yod do// gzug
gzugs kyis stong ste/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de gzugs ma lags/ gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid

kyang gzugs so// sgra sgras stong ste/ sgra'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sgra ma lags/ sgra las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sgra nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang sgra'o/

dri dris stong ste/ dri'i stong ba nyid gang lag pa de yang dro so lags/ dri las guden dang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ dri nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang dri'o// re res stong ste/ ro'i stong
pa nyid gang lags pa de yang ro ma lags/ ro 'a sa gud na yang stongapa nyid ma mchasarta/ ro nyid kyang stongapa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang de'o// reg reg gis stong ste/ reg gi stongapa nyid gang
'gus pa de yang reg ma lags/ reg las gudan yang stong pa nyidam mchis te// rig nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang reg go chos chos kyis stong ste/ chos kyi stong pa nyid gang la
pa de yang chos ma lags/ sa las gud na yang stong pa de ma mchis te/ chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang chos so// mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong
ste/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de ang yig gi rnam par shes pa ma lags/ mig gi rnam par shes pa las gud naang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ mig gi rnam
nga ra shes pa de kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang mag gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam nga ra shes pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ rna ba'i rnam par shes nga 'a stong pa nyid
gang lags pa de yang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma 'a gas/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ta/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang
rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa sna'i rnam par shes pas stong sta/ sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sna'i rnam par shes pa ma lags//
sna'i rnam par shes pa las gud na yang steng pa nyid ma mchis te/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i/ lce'i rnam par shes pa lce'i rnam
par shes pas stong sgyu/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de gang lce'i rnam par shes pa ma lags/ lce'i rjes bar shes pa las gud na yang stod
pa nyid ma mchis ta lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes ba las kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ lus
kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang lus kyi rnam par shes ba ma lags/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa
nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam bar shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ yid kyi rnam pa ra shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang
lags pa de yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma lags/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa las gu du na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid
kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus tu rag pas stong ste/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong ba nyid gang lags pa de yang mgo gi 'dus te reg pa ma
lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las gdon yang stongapa ma mchis te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyidi/ stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rna ba'i 'dus
te reg pas stong ste/ rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rna ba'i bdus te reg pa ma lags/ rnabab 'dus te reg pa las bud na yang stong pa nyidim mchis te/ rna ba'i 'dus
te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sna 'dus te reg pa sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong sta/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang
sna'i 'dus te rig pa ma lags/ sna' 'dus te rig pa las gud na yang stong pa nyidi mal chas te/ sna'i 'dus 'og pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stongapa nyid kyang snya'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ lce'i 'dus par g
ba rtse'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa de gang lags pa de yang lci'i 'dus tarig pa ma lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa lag gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/

lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong ba nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'o dus de rag pa lus kyi 'dus te rigu bas stong ste/ lus kyi 'dus tarig pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags
pa de yang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa de/ stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te
rig pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus rta rag pas stong ste/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yid kyi 'dus te rig pa ma lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
las gud yang stong nyid ma mchis te// yid kyi 'dus te rtsag pa nyid kya9stong pa nyid/ stong gnyid kyang yid kyi 'dus terig pa'o// mig gi 'dus tarig pa'i rgyan gyis tshor
bamig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stongs mig gi 'dus te rig pa'i skyon gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mig gi 'dus rag pa'i nagyis tshorab ma lags/ mig

gi 'dus te rig ba'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gudanamang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ mig gi 'dus ta rig ba'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong ba nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis

tshor ba'o// rna ba ba 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshorab rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ rna ba' 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rna ba'i 'dus
rag pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lugs/ rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa'i skyon gyis tshor ba las gu dan yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i skyon gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid//
stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sna 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sna'i 'dus te rig pa'iskyon gyis tshor bas stong sta/ sna'i 'dus te reg ba'i rkyen
gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags/ sna'i 'dus ta rog pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lag gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ lha'i

'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o lce'i gdus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtse'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
gyis tshor bas stong ste/ lce'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i skyon gyisachor ba ma lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba

las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ lce'i 'dus rta rag pa'i rgyan gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus tarig pa'i skyon gyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen

gyis tshor ba 'dus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyan gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang lus kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bam lag/

lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i

rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ mde kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de
yang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i skyon gyi se tshor ba las gud na yang stong ba nyid ma mchis te/ med kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyan gyis tshor ba
nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang yod kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bgo/ sa khams sa'i khams kyis stong sku/ sa khams kyi stong ba nyid gang lags
pa de yang sa'i khams ma lags/ sa'i khams las gudan yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so// chu'i khams chu'i khams kyis
stong ste/ chu'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chu'i khams ma lags/ chu'i khams las gud g.yang stongal ma mchis te/ chu'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang
chu'i khams so// ma'i debams ma'i khams kyig stong sku/ ma'i khams kyi stong pa de gang lags pa de yang mi'i khams ma lags ma'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchir
taM/ mo'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang ma'i khams so// rlung gi khams rlung gi khams kyis stong ste/ rlung gi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rlung gi khams
ma lags/ rlung gi khams las gudun yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// nam mkha'i khams nam mkhalikhams
kyis stong ste/ nam mkha'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang nam mkha'i khams ma lags/ nam mkha'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ nam mkha'i khams
nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa/
de yang rnam pa ra shes pa'i khams ma lags/ rnam par shes pa'i khams las gu dan yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par she
pa'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa ma rig pas stong ste/ ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang ma rig pa ma lags/ ma rig pa las gud na mang stong pa nyid ma mchis
ti ma rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa de kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ste/ 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed ma lags/ 'du byed las
gudon yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong sgyu/ rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang
lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma lags/ rnam par shes pa las bud naang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/
ming dang gzugs ming dang gzugs kyis stong ste/ mang dang gzugs kyi stong pa nyide gang lags pa de yang ming dang gzugs ma lags/ ming dang gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis
ga te/ de dang ba thugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ sto nga pa nyid kyang mngedang gzugs so// skye mched drug skye mched drug gis stong ste/ rgya mchod drug gi stongapa nyid gang lags pa
de yang skye mched drug ma lags/ skye mched drug las gudanal nga stongapa nyid ma mchis te/ skya mched drug nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong ba nyid kyang skye mched drug go/ rig pa rig pas stong ste/
rig ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang reg pa ma lags/ ldog pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba tshor bas
stong ste/ tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba ma lags/ tshorab las gud na yang stong pa ma mchis/ tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// srid pa
srid pa sa stong ste/ sud nga 'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang srid pa ma lags/ srid pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ srid pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang srid/
pa'o// len pa len pas stong ste/ len pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang lan pa ma lags/ len pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ len pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/
stong pa nyid kyang len pa'o// srid pa srid pas stongalta/ srid pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang de pa ma lags/ srib las gud na yang stong nyid ma mchis te/ srid pa nyid kyang stong

ba nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang srid pa 'o// skyo ba skyo bas stong ste/ skye ba stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang skya ba ma lags/ skyo ba las gudanaya stong pa de ma mchis te/ skyo ba nyid kyang stongang

nyid stong pa nyid kyang skya ba'o/ rga shirga shis stong ste/ rga sha'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rga shi me lags/ rga shi les gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rga shi nyid kyang stong pa
nyid: stong pa nyid kyang rga shi'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'a raM/ ma rig pa la
gzhus par ma bgyi'o// 'du byed la gnas par ma bgyi'o// rnam par shes pa ba gnas par ma bgyi'o/ mang dang gzugs la gnas par ma bgyi'o// skya mchad drug la gnas ba'amaM
bgyi'o// rig pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// tshor gal gnas par ma bgyi'o// srid pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ len pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// srid pa la gnas par mi 'gyi'o//
skya ba la gnas par ma bgyi'o// na la gnas par ma bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gus rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyod pa'i tshe/

sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mo bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin sprin dkarebal tu shing saso ste/spyi dang yirob tu zhi ba'astong pa de gad ga sa
pa de yang sbyin pa'i pha rol gyin pa ma lags/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gudan yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sbyin pa 'pha rol tu phyin ba nyid kyang stong pa nyidi/
stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sogs dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu byed pa la spyod ba'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi kha
rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad dun na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin bas stong ste/ tshul khrims kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gudan yang stong pa nyid ma chus te/ tshul khrims
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhanayang byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la kun s pachi bgyi ste/ de ci'i sladang kun/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di lta bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bzod ba'i pha rol tu phyin
bas stong ste/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong ba nyid gang lags pa de yang bzodapa'i ba rol tu phyin pa ma lags/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang stong ba nyid ma mchis te/

03 bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong ba nyid/ stongapa nyid kyang bzod pa 'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhanayang byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shas rarakyi pha rol

du phyin pa la spyod pa 'tsho/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa 'chi bgyi sto/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'dras de na 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtson 'grus kyi
la tu phyin pas stong// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tuphyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na
yang stong nyid ma mchis te/ brtson 'grus kyi pa'ol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong ba nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang bartson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhanayang byang chubs mas
dba' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi lta/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar
bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gtan gyi b.rol tu phyin pas stong sku/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags
bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gudanaang stong pa nyid mamachis te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong ba nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
bu/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub bams dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shas rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ci'i

slad du'o na/bcom ldan 'das don 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha lo tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong su/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang shes rab kyi lo
rol tu phyin pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las bud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyide kyang stong pa de/ stong pa nyid kyang shes ltag khyil
rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs desan/ byang nubasam sa dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'atsho/ pha rol tu phyin pajug la gnas pa na
ga bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa'achon pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/dran pa b.ragazhag rab zhi'i gnas pam gyi sgo/
daci'i sged dus na/bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar dran pa nye b.ragazhag b rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i stong nyid gang lags ba de yang dran pa nye bar
gzhag pa rnams ma lags/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gud na yang stong ra nyid ma mchis te/ dran pa nyabar gzhag pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong ba nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
rnams so// bcom ldan 'dus rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dang 'a sems dba' chen pos shas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'i tshe/ dran ba nyeb gzhag pa rnams la gnas par mi
bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhanayang byang chub so chas dba' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas par ma bgyi ste/

daca'i smadadu zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar yang dag par slong ba rnams yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ste/ yang dag par thongab rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yang dag par spong/
ba rnams ma lags/ ang dag par spong ba rnams las gud na yang stongs nyid ma mchis ta/ adag par spong ba rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// bam
ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ abadag par spong ba rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan
'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyine pa la stod pa'i tsho/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi sto/ daci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan

'dab de ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkangapa rnams kyi e stong ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi stengapa nyid gang lags pa de yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma 'gas/
rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams lag gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi zheng pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/ bcom ldan
'dus rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba rnagag la gnas pa ma bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das/

tsho gzhan yang byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chenapos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'tsho/ dbang po lnga la gnas par mi bgyi sto/ de ci'i slad dunan/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar dbang
pornamag dbang po rnams kyis stong ste dbang po rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang dbang po rnams ma lags/ dbang bo rnams las gu dan yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ta/ dbang po rnams kyang
stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang dbang po rnamasaso// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ dbang po
rnams la gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ stobs lnga la gnas par bgyi//
de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar stobs rnams stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ stobs rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang stobs rnams ma lags/ stobs rnams las
gud na yang stong pa nyidam mchis to/ stobs rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shar//
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ stobs rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa'i tsho/ byang chub kyi yon lag bdun la gnas par ma brgya sta/ daci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'od ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnamasu byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong//
byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma lag// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams lta gud na yang stong nga nyi na chis te/ byang chub kyi
lag rnams kyang stong pa nyidi/ stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dang sems dang la chen pob/ shes rab kyi nga ro' tu
phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ byang nub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'i// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dang 'a bams dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/
pa'i tsho/ 'phags pa'i lom na lag brgyad pa la ba/nas par mi bgyi ste/ pa ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das da ni 'di ltar lam lam gyis stong ste/ lam gyi stong pa nyid gang la gabs pa de yang
lam ma lags/ lam bas gdan ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ lam yang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang lam mo// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par ma bgyi'o bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
soms dang 'a chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la gnas par ma bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das da ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden
sgyu pa rnams 'thogs pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma lags/ 'phags pa'i bden pa
rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis pa// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des
u0f8b na= byang nub sems dba' sems dpa' chen pos shas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ 'phags pa'i bdenapa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ bsam gtan bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de na 'di ltar
bam pa/ tan rnams bsam gtan rnams kyis stongs/ bsam gtan rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang bsam gtan rnams ma lags/ ! bsam gtan rnams las gud na yang stong
pa nyid ma mchis te/ bsam gtan rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
bos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ bsam gtan rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'dang lagazhan ya nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bshas

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod nga 'i tsho/ tshad med pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi lta/ de ci'i slad du zhi na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshad med pa rnams tshad med pa rnalas kyis stong ste//
tshad med pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshad med pa rnams ma lags/ tshad med pa rnams 'as gudan yang stong pa nyid ma mchis chod mad pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong
pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rmad mad pa
rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ gzugs med pa 'i snyoms par
'jug pa bzhi la gnas par ma bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni da ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa la 'jug pa rnams gzugs med pa'i snyom/
par 'jug pa rnams kyis stongalta/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma lags/
gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug ba rnams las gung na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs/
sna mang pa 'asnyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang nub soms dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'atsho/ gzugs
mad pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par ma bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
wa bar tharab brgyad la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du nan/ bcom ldan 'das da ni 'di ltararnam par thar pa rnams rnam par thar pa rnams kyi re stong// rnam par thar pa rnams kyi stong ba nyid
gang lags pa de yang rnam par thar pa rnams ma lags/ rnam par thar pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnamar ra
thar pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs desan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho rnam par thar pa rnams la gnas par
mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gnyan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen pos shes rab kyi seT rol tu phyin pa bu 'a sprod pa'i tsho/ makar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnag
pa ra mi bgyi sgo/ de ci'i slad du zhun/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/
mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma lags/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa rnamasu 'a sa gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis taM/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa/
rnams so// bcom ldan 'dus rnam grangs des na/ byang chub mas dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'tsho/ mthur gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
pa rnam la gnas par mi bgyi// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen res ngashas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
dang/ mtshanam med pa dang/ smon pa med pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ daci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'altar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshon
ma mod pa dang/ smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo song pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pas stong ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma yod pa dang/
smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan la tshud pa dang/ smon pa med pa ma lags/ rnam pa thar pa'i sgo stengapa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med

zla pa dang/ smon pa med pa las gudan yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa yang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar
pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sams dpa' sems dang 'chan pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa 'i tsho/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo steng pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon ba mad pa la gnas par ma bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chasha
po so shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas par mi bgyi/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das da ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs
pa'i stobs rnams dbu zhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ de bzhin gshags pa'i stobs rnams kyi stong ba nyid gang lags pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su//
lags/ dbazhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang stong ba nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
stobs rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam gras des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'i stobs//
rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sa mas dpa' ams dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ mi 'jigs pa bzhake:
gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma 'jigs pa rnams mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ste/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang
lags pa de yang mi 'jigs pa rnams ma lags/ mi 'jigs pa rnams las gung na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang ma
'jigs pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba la spyod pa'i/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la
gnus par ma bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ so so yang dag pa zhig
lo pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar so so gang dag par rig pa rnams so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ste/ so so yang
dgu pa'i rig pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa dayang go so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gudan yang stong pa nyid ma mchis pa/
sgyu so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang nub sams dpa' sems
dpa' chen pos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ so so yang dag par 'ge pa rnams la gnas par ma bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems

T+Tha dang ba chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po la gnas par ma bgyi ste: de ci'i slad du zhe naM/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byams pa

chen po na byams pa chen pog stong/ snying rje chenapo nisnying rje chen pos stong ste/ bcom ldan 'das byams pa chen po'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang/ snying rje chen po'i stong pa nyid gang lags ra

de yang sa pa chen po ma lags/ rdzongang snying rje chen po ma 'gas// byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po 'a sa bu dun ya nga stong pa 'anyid ma mchis te/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po yang stong
pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po sa na rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
tshe byams pa chen po dang snyinge rje chen po la gnas par mi bgyi// bcom ldan 'das ga zhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyud la gnas bar mi bgyi sta/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
ba rnams kyis stong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la
gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ta ! sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang stong pa nyide/ stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs
des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi 'o/
'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa tsho/ yi ge rnams la gnas par ma bgyi skom gyi mngon par
ko bsgrub pa la gnas par mi bgyi/ gcig tu brjod pa la gnas pa ra mi bgyi/ gnyis su brjod pa la gnas par ma bgyi/ tha dad du brjod pa la gnas par ma bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
! bcom ldan 'dras da na 'di ltar yi ge rnams yi ga rnams kyis stong ste/ yi ge rnams kyi stong pa de gang lags pa de ang yi ge rnams ma lags/ yi ga rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma
mchis te/ yi ge rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang a ga rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pog shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yi ge rnams la gnas par ma bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sogs dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'atsho mngon par
y+Yo gas pa rnams 'a gnas par ma bgyi lta/ da ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltaraman par shes pa rnamasaman pa' shas ba rnams kyis stong ste/ man par shes pa rnams kyi
stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mngon par shes pa rnams lags/ mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stodapa/
nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub gnas dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ man par shes pa
rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das ga zhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ ting 'dzin gyi sgo rnams la gnas
bar mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/ shing nga 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyi stong nyid gang lag

pa de yang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnam ga ma lags ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ de nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin
gyi sgo rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs de na/ byang chub po mas dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ri/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la
gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang nub sems dpa' soms dang 'a chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la gnas par
mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhi na/ bcom ldan 'dres do ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang
gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma lags/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te ! gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzungs
kyi sgo rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la
'tshe gnas par mi 'gyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems drapa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ gzugs mi rtag go
zhes bgyi bar gnas par ma bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhan/ bcom ldan 'das da ni 'di ltar gzugs ma rtag pa nyid kyis stong sku/ gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa
de yang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs mi rtag pa de las gud nayang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs ma rtag pa nyid kyang stongapa nyid/ stong ba nyid kyang gzugs ma rtag
panyid do// bcom ldan 'dus rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ gzugs mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar
gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ chor ba mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ rici'i slad du zhi na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di

ltag tsho ba mi rtag pa nyid tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba la rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid ma 'gas/ tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid las gudan yang
stong pa nyid ma mchis/ tshogs mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa gnas dpa'
cha' bos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ tshor ba mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par ma bgyi'o// des[]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ 'dugs mi rtag
go zhes bgyi bar gnas pa la bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhan/ bcom ldan 'das ngani 'di ltar 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid 'dushis mi rtag pa nyid kyis stongs/ 'du shes ma rtog pa nyid kyi
stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes la rtag pa nyid ma lags/ 'du shes ma rtog pa nyid las gudan yang stong pa nyid ma mchis cu/ 'du shes mi rtog pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong
pa nyid kyang 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sam ga dpa'achan pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ 'du shes mi rtag go
zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po shubazhi pa/// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu ni
pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ 'du byed mi rtag go zhus bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byedami rtag pa nyid 'du byed mi rtag pa
nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed ma rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te// 'du byed mi

'tsha rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/
spyod pa'i tsho/ 'du byed mi rtog go zhes bgyi par gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam par shes ba mi rtag go zhes bgyi ba la gnas par ma bgyi ste/

daci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das da ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong sta/ rnam par shes pa mi rtagang nikyisos pa nyanag 'gag de yang rnam pa

( shes pa mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ rnam pa ra shes pa mi rtag pa nyid las gudan yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa ma rtog pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa
mi rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'dus rnam grangs des na/ byang chub so mas dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag go zhes bgyi
bar gnas par ma bgyi'o/ bcom ldan 'das gzhanayang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'tshe/ gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes pa bar
gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhon/ bcom ldan 'das de na 'di ltar gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid gzugs sdug bsngal pa nyid kyis stong ste ! gzugs sdug bsngal nyid kyi stong pa zhi
gang lags pa de yang gzugs sdug bsngal bad ma lags/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyidi ma mchis pa/ gzugs sdugabasngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong
pa nyid kyang gzugs sdug bsngal gnyid do// bcom ldan 'dus rnam grangs dosan/ byang chub sems dar ba sogs dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa tsho/ gzugs sdug
bsngal la zhes bgyi bor gnas par ma bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ tshor ba sdug bsngal la zhus bgyi bor gnas pa ra mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/

bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong sta/ tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong ba nyid gang lags pa dag nga tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid ma
lags/ tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid los gudan yang stongapa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan
grubya/ 'dus rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ tshor ba sdug bsngal la zhes bgyi bor gnas par mi bgyi 'o//
des shes rab kyi pha rol tu zhib la spyod pa'i tsho/ 'du shes sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ da ci'i slad du zhu na/ bcom ldan 'das don 'di ltar 'dushas sdug bsngal ba ni
'du ngashes sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ 'dushas sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shas sdug bsngal ba nyid malags/ 'du shas sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud
na yang stongang nyid ma mchis te/ 'dushas sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du bas sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'
sams dpa' chen po sa gas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyodapa'i tsho/ 'du shes sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas pa 'a ma bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ 'du byed

lce sdug bsnga'adra la zhes bgyi bar gnas pa'am bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcomo ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed sdug/
bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/ 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid
kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sams dang 'asams dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa'i tsho/ 'du byed sdug bsngal lozhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cho/ rnam par gas pa sdug bsngal 'pho zhes bgyi bo gnas
par ma bgyi sta/ de ci'i slod du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stongs/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal
ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes ba sdug bsngal ba de ma lags M/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid les gud na yang stong nyid ma mchige/ rnalorasheg
ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sogs
dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ gzugs bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par ma bgyi sto/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs/
bdag med pa nyid gzugs bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs bdag med pa nyidi ma lags/ gzugs/
lo bdag med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs bdagayod pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs bdag med pa nyid de/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/
'a byang nub soms dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ gzugs bdag med do zhes bgyi b.raganas par ma bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
pa'i tsho/ tshor ba bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lta/ de ci'i slad du zhu na/ bcom ldan 'dusad ni 'di ltar tshor ba bdag med pa nyid tshor ba bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba
bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang 'a gas pa de yang tshor ba bdag med bde ma lags/ tshor ba bdag med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis tsho ra ba bdag mdar nyid kyang stong pa
nyid stong pa nyer kyang tshor ba bdag med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub soms dang 'a sa'as dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ 'o ba
bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ 'du shes bdag med de zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste// doci'i slad du zhen/ bcom
ldan 'das de 'di ltar 'du shes bdag med pa nyid gdugs bdag med pa nyid kyis stong sku/ 'dugs bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'dushes bdag med pa nyid ma lags/
'du shes bdag med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis taM/ 'du shes bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes bdag med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs
dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ 'du shes bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ 'du bya/ bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'da' da na 'di ltar 'du byed bdag med pa nyid 'du byed bdag med
pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed bdag med pa nyid ma lags/ 'du byed bdag med pa khyod las gudan yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/
'du byed bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyide/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed bdag med pa nyid do// btsem ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub soms dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ 'du byed bdag med de zhes bgyi bar gnas par ma bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam par shes pa bdag med do[II]
zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi sgo/ de ci'i slad du zhe na bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyis stod//
sta rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shas pa bdag med pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid la
mchis te/ rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyade kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid do/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa'amA
dba' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ngom sa dpa'
chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ gzugs zhiganyis bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ da cig spyod du zhu na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs zhi ba nyid gzugs hU~M
ba nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs zhi bo nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs zhi ba da ma lags/ gzugs zhi ba nyid las gud na ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs zhi ga ste/
kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs zhi ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnamo grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'i tshi/
[s/]gzugs zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par ma bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi sha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ tshor ba zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas pa mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das

dani 'di ltar tshor ba zhib nyid tshor ba zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba zhib nyid ma lags/ tshor ba shu ba nyid las gudan ya stong pa nyid ma mchis te/
tsho gzhi ba nyid kyang stong ba nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang tshorab zhi ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs das na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa ri tsa/ tshor ba zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes zhe'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi sta/ de ci'i slad du zhu na/
bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du ba zhi ba nyid 'du shes zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shas che ba de ma lags 'du shes nib nyid
las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'dushas zhi bde kyang stongapa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes zhi ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la spyod pa'i cho/ 'dushos ni'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ 'du byed zhi'o zhes bgyi bar
[p]/ khyu// gnas par ma brgya// deci'i slad duzhin/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed rigs pa nyid 'du byed zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byedu zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa
daang 'du byed zhu ba nyid ma 'gas/ 'du byed zhi ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis// 'du byedazhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stongang nyid kyang 'du byed zhi ba nyid do// bcom ldan
'das rnam grangs ngos na/ byang chub bo mas dpa' sems dang 'a chon pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ 'du byed ni 'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par ma bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha la

tshu tu phyin pa la spyod pa'atshe/ rnam par shes pa zhigazhas bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa zhi de nyid rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid

kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyidi ma lags// rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid las gudu naang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par
shes pa zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong ba nyid kyang rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam gras desazha/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gus rab kyi pha rol du phyin
pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam par shes pa zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi// bcom ldan 'dzam gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achan pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
pa'i tshe/ gzugs stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi sgyu/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das da ni 'di ltar gzugs stong pa nyid gzugs stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs stong
nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags ba de yang gzugs stong pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs stong pa nyid las gudan yang song nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs stong pa nyid kyang stongapa nyid/ stong pa nyid
kyang gzugs stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'dus rnam grangs des na/ byang chub semasadapa'asams dpa'achen pos shaba'ab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ gzugs stong zhes bgyi kher

gnas par mi bgyi'o/ des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ tshor ba gong dezhes bgyi bor gnas par mi bgyi lta/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das da ni 'di ltar tshor ba stong pa nyin

tshor ba stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshorab stong pa nyid kyistong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba stong pa nyid na lags/ tshor ba stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong ba nyid ma mchis ta/ tshor ba skyong/
pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam gras desan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gshag bab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pacha/
tshor ba stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par ma bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ 'du shes stong zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ datsit+taM sladad zhen/ bcom ldan
'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes stong pa nyid 'du shes stong pa nyidakyis stong sgyu/ 'du shes stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes stong ba nyid lags/ 'du shes stong pa/
nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes stong ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes stong pa nyare do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub soms dpa'i

sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ 'du shes stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyid 'dos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong nga rimaM/ 'du byang stong ngo

zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed stong pa nyid 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi ba stong rgyu/ 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa

deyang 'du byed stong pa nyid ma lags/ 'du byed stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong ba nyid kyang 'du byed stong pa nyid do// bcom
N+NaM ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa 'a sams dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ 'du byed stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas pa lagi bgyi'o// des shes rab

kyi kha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bgyi bor gnas par mi bgyi ste/ daci'i slad du shan/ bcom ldan 'das da na 'diltar rnam pa ra shes pa stong pa nyid rnam par shes pa stong

[n/]pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam pa rashes pa stong pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes rab stong pa nyid las gudanaang stong pa nyid ma mchis

to rnam bar shes pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa la shes pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangasadas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pog shes rab kyi la/
rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par ma bgyi'o// bcos ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub mas dang ba sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la spyod pa'i/ gzugs mtshan ma mad do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ da ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid gzugs mtshan ma mar pa nyid
kyis stong rgyu : gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang 'a gas pa daang gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/
gzugs mtshan ma yod pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gazugs mtshan ma med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dang na sems dpa' chen pos shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ gzugs mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ tshor ba mtshan med jo bas bgyi bar
[t, ]khyu// gnas pa'am bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de na 'di ltar tshor ba mtshan ma med pa nyidatshor ba mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba mtshan ma da pa nyid/
kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba mtshan ma med pa nyid las tshor ba mtshan ma med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis pa/ tshor ba mtshan ma chad pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid
'a stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba mnaM nu ma mdapa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs de na/ byang chub sa na dang 'gan sa dang[]'a chen thog sa las kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rab

mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par ma bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod nga 'i tshe/ 'du shes mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gzhas nga ra mi bgyi sgyu khyi'i slod du zhu zhu//
bcom ldan 'das da ni 'di ltar 'du shos mtshan ma med pa nyid 'du shes mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis stong sta 'du shes mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes mtshan
u0f8b ma med pa nyid ma lags/ 'du shes mtshan ma mad pa nyide las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes mtshan ma mdapa nyid kyang stong pa de/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du bas mtshan ma med
pa nyid do/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs dosan/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen ngos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ 'dugs mtshan ma mad do zhes bgyi bar gnas
par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ 'du byed mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi brgya sta/ de ci'i sled du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du
byed mtshan ma med pa nyid 'du byed mtshanam mdapa nyid kyis stong sku 1 'du byadamtshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid grang lags pa de yang 'du byed mtshan ma med pa nyid ma lags/ 'du byed/
mtshan ma med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed mtshanas mad pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed mtshan ma med pa nyid do// bcom ldan
'das rnam grangs dris na/ byang nub soms dang 'a sa mas dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byad mtshan ma yod do zhes bgyi bar gnas par ma bgyis
des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam par shes pa mtshanam mud do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi brgya spyod ci'i slad du zhu na/ bcom ldan 'das de na 'di ltar rnam
par shes pa mtshanam med pa 'di rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis stong sgyu rnam par shes pa mtshan ma mdapa da kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa daang nas pag shos pa mtshanam
mad pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid las gudan yang stong pa nyid ma mchis taM/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par
shes pa mtshan ma med pa byed do// bcom ldan 'dus rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dang 'gams dpa'achin ngo bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'i tshe/
rnam par shes pa mtshan ma chad do zhes bgyi bor gnas par ma bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa'achon pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'a spyod pa'i
tsho= gzugs smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par ma bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhin/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs smon pa mad pa nyid gzugs smon pa med pa nyid kyis stongs/
gzugs smon pa med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags ba de yang gzugs smon pa yod pa nyidam lags/ gzugs smonapa med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchib pa/ gzugs
smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs smon pa med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des nu/ byang chub sums dang bu sogs dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi
pha la tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ gzugs smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ro/ tshor ba smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas
pa'ami bgyi ste/ datsa'i thod du shu na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba smon pa med ba nyid tshor ba snonapa mdapa nyid kyis stongs/ tshor ba na pa med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags
pa de yang tshor ba snon pa med pa nyid ma lags/ tshor ba smon pa med pa ni de las gu du na ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshonA ba smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang ro
ba smon pa med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyinam la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba smon pa mdado zhes
bgyi ba'aganas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ 'du shes smon ba mar bozhes bgyi bar gnas b.ramo bgyi lta[Y]da rtsi'i smad du zha na/ bcom ldan 'das
don 'di ltar 'du shes sgronub yod pa nyid 'du shes smon pa med pa nyid kyis stong sku/ 'du shes smon pa med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes smyon pa yod pa nyid ma lags/
'a shasasmon pa yod pa de las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes smon pa med ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes smon pa med pa nyid do/ bcom ldan 'das
rnam grangs desan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdu shes smonupa mad do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ rig
shog rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ 'du byed smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas pa'i mi bgyi sgo/ da ci'i slad du shu na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed smon pa med/
pa nyid 'du byed smon pa med pa nyid kyi ge stong ste/ 'du byed smon pa med pa nyid kyi stong ba nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed smon pa med pa nyid ma lags/ 'du byed
smon pa mad pa nyid las gud na yang stong ba nyade ma mchas te/ 'du byedasmon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong ba nyid kyang 'du byed smin pa mang pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam
'a sa des na/ byang chub pa nas dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa 'tsho/ 'du byed smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas pa rami bgyi'o// des shes rab
kyi ba rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'atsho/ rnam par shes pa smon ba mdado zhes bgyi bar gnas par ma bgyi ste/ datsa'i smad du zhan/ bcom ldan 'das da ni 'ad ltar rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa/
nyid rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shas nga smon pa med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shis pa smon pa med pa nyide ma lags/ rnam par/
shas pa smo na pa med pa nyid las gud na yang stong ra nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong ba nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par nas pa smonapa yod pa nyid do/
bcom ldan 'das rnam gros desan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pog las rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shas pa smyon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas
par mi bgyi'o/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' mas dpa' chen thos shas 'ab kyi nga rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ gzugs dpon no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi
sta da rtsi'i slad du nan/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs dban pa nyid gzugs dbacapa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs dben pa nyid kyi stong panyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs
dben pa nyidi ga lags/ gzugs dben pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis pa/ gzugs dban pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs dben pa nyid do//
bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'atsho/ gzugs dgon no zhes bgyi bar gnas par m bgyi//
ras shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'tsho/ tshor ba dben no zhes bgyi bor gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba dben pa nyidi tshor ba dban

kyang stong pa nyid/ stongapa nyid kyang tshor ba dben pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/

de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi 'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhanayang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ngos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ chos
nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das da na 'di ltar chos nyid chos nyid kyis stong ste/ chos nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos nyid ma lags/
'a chos nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchig taM/ chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang chos nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
bos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ chos nyid la gnas par ma bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dad pa chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyings na gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhezhu/ bcos ldan 'dus de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings chos kyi dbyings gyis stong ste chos kyi dbyings kyi stong
