gas nga 'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg nga 'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa la// rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa 'i rang bzhin nadangos po med pa'o// sgra'i 'dus te reg pa 'i rang bzhin ni
dngos po med pa/ lci'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos bo med pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// yid kyi dus te reg pa 'irang bzhin ni dngos po med pa 'o// mig

gi 'dus te rig pa 'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// na ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin zhi dngos po med pa/ sna'i 'dus te rig pa'i rgyan gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin/
ni dngos po med pa'o lce'i 'dug tu reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dngos po mad pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dngos po mad pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg

pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po mad pa'o// sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin zhi dngos po med pa'o/ me khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med/
pa'o rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin dngos po med pa'o// nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// ma rig pa'i rang
bzhinani dngos po mad pa'o// 'du byed kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// skye mched
drug gi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'i// rig pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/ tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos bo mad pa'o// srid pa'i rang bzhini'i dngos po med pa'o// len pa'i rang bzhin ni
das po med pa'o// srid pa'i reng bzhin ni dngos po me dpa'o// skyo ba'i rangabazhin dngos po med pa'o// rga shi'i rang bzhin ni dngos bo mad pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang zhin ni dngos
dze nad pa'o/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin na dngos po med pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni nangos po med pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin nad ngos po med pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin nadangos po med pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin nga'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// nang stong pa nyid kyi

rang bzhin ni dngos po mdapa'o// phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin na dog po med pa'o// khrinang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po rnad pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos ro med pa'o// tshan

bo stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po da nga 'o// na dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med ra 'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang

bzhin ni dngos po na du nga lo// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po ni da da lo// thog ma dang tha na med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang shanyin ni dngos po dba'o/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang

bzhin ni dngos po me da nga 'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po na da pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du ngob

po rnad pa'o// zhi dmigs ra stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po dang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med nga 'o// nge de de stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngod po mad da do//

bamathadangos bo med pa'i ngo bo 'di stong nyid kyi rang bzhin zhi dngos po med pa'o// dran pa nyabar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa 'o//
'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyirang bzhin dngos po med pa'o// dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa// stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos bo med pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams

kyi rang po zhin zhi dngos po med pa'o// lam rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos pa tshad nga 'o// 'phags pa'i bdenapa rnams kyi rang bzhin nidangos po tshadang lo// bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med paso
tshad med pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ngaso na dang// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi'ang bzhin zhi dngos po med pa'o// rnam par sbyar pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po daralo mthar

gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug ba rnams kyi rangabazhinani dngos po med pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong ba nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po medang// mngon par
shas ba rnams kyi rang bzhin dngos po med pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin dngos bo med pa'o/ gzus kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa 'o// dbazhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam

kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// ma 'jigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin zhi dngos po med pa// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin dengos po med pa'o// byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med
pa'o snying rje chen po'i rang bzhinani dngos po med pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rang bzhin dngos po med pa'o// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin

ni dengos po med pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni dengos po med pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhinani dngos po med pa 'o// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhinani dngos po

med pa'o// rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin na dngos po med pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin na dngos po med pa'o//

de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni de ngos po mad pa'o// ma nor bde bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhanani dngos po med pa 'o// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin u0f8b nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// chos nyid kyi rang
bzhinani dngos po med pa'o// chos kyi dbyinges kyi rang bzhin ni dengosaro med pa'o// chos kyi gnas nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dengos po med pa'o// chos skyon med pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po mad pa'o//
yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhinen dngos po med pa 'o// tshe dang ldan rangasha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na 'di ltar gzugs la gzugs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ tshor ba la tsher ba'i/
rang bzhin med pa dang/ 'du shes la 'du shes kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ 'du byed la 'du byed kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang/
thatha9 mig lamig ga rang bzhin med pa dang/ rnab la rna ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ sna la sna'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ lcel rtse'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ lus la lus kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ ]
yid 'a yid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ gzugs la gzugs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ sgra la sgra'i rang bzhin med pa dad/ dril dri'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ ro la ro'i rang bzhin med pa dang//
rag 'a rog gi rang bzhinamed pa dang/ chos la chos kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la mgi ga rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rna ba'i
rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa la sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la lce'i rnam par shes pa'arang bzhin med pa dang/
lus kyi rnam par shes pa la lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'irang bzhin med pa dang/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mig
gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rnaba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'a sna'i 'dus ltareg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang/
lce'i 'dus te reg pa la lce'i 'dus tereg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin re da pa dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yid kyi
'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin mar pa dang/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ rna ba'i
'dus tareg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ sna'i 'dus tarig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lasna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i

rang bzhin med pa dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i skyon gyis tshor ba la rtse'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la lus kyi 'dus
te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor nga la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la rgyan gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ sa'i khams la sa'i
khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ chu'i khams la chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ me'i khams la me'i khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ rlung gi khams la rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin med
pa dang/ nam mkha'i khams la nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin mdo pa dang/ ma rig pa la ma rig pa'i rang bzhin
mdapa dang/ 'du byed la 'du byed kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ ming dang gzugs 'a mang dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/

tha sku mched drug la skye mchedadrug gi rang bzhin med pa dang/ reg pa la reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ tshor ba la tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ sred pa la srid pa'i rang bzhin me da pa dang/
lenapa la lenapa'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ srid pa la srid nga 'i rang bzhin med pa dang skya ba la skye ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ rga shi la rga shi'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol

tu phyin pa la sprin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin mad pa dang/ bzod pa'i snga rol tu phyin pa la/
bathod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin me da pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ nang stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid kyi rang

bzhin med pa dang/ phyi stong pa nyid laphyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa

nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ chen postong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid kyirang bzhin med pa dang/ 'dus byas stong
mtshab/ @#// pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyirang bzhin med pa dang/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi red bzhin med pa dang/ mtha' las 'das pa stor

pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyirang bzhin med pa dang/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ dor ba med pa stong

tshul nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid

kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la ma dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/

dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bonyid stong pa nyadi
la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyide stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhinamed pa dang/ dranapa zhepar gzhag pa rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhug pa'i rang bzhinamad pa dang/ yang dag par sbyong b rnams la yang dag
ga spong pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ dbang po rnams la dbang po'i rang bzhin yod pa dang/ stobs rnams la
0/stobs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la byang chub kyi yan lag gi rang bzhin med pa dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la lam gyi rang bzhin med pa dang/
'bags pa'i bden pa rnams la 'phags pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ bsam gtan rnams la bsam gtan gyi rang bzhanemed pa dang/ tshad med pa rnams la tshad med pa 'i rang bzhin
med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la rnam par thar pa'i rang bzhin len pa
dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/
son pa med pa la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams la mdon par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa
dang/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gzungs kyi sgo'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcul de bzhin gshegrwa
pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la mi 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la so so yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ snying
byabyad rje chen po la snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ rgyun du zhug
pa'i 'bras bu 'argyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i
'bras bu la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid la dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ rang byang chub la rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/
lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyirangabazhin med pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ched bzhin med pa dang/ de bzhin
nyid la de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ mnor pa de bzhin nyid la ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid la gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi rang
bzhin med pa dang/ chos nyid lachosanyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ chos kyi dbyings la chos kyi dbyis kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ chos kyi gnas nyid la chos kyi gnas nyid kyi rang bzhin med
wA pa dang/ chos skyon med pa nyid la chos skyon med pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin med par shes par bya'o// tshadang ldan
pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang gzugs la gzugasakyi mtshan nyid med do// tshor ba latshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do// 'du shes la 'dushes kyi mtshan re med do// 'du byed la 'du byed kyi mtshan
nyid med do// rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do// mig la mag gi mtshan nyid med do// rna ba la rna ba'i mtshan nyid med do// sna la sna'i mtshan de mad do// lce
la lce'i mtshan nyid med do// lus la lus kyi mtshan nyid med do// yade la yid kyi mtshan nyid med do// gzugs la gzugs[]mtshan nyid med do// sgra la sgra'i mtshan nyid med do//
dril dri'i mtshan nyid med do// rol ro'i mtshan nyid med do// reg la regagi mtshan nyid med do// chos la chos kyamtshan nyid med do// mig gi rnam par shes pa la mig ga rnam par shes
ba'i mtshananyid mad do// rnaba'i rnam par shes pa la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do// sna'i rnam par shes pa la sna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do// lce'i rnam par
shes pa la lce'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa la lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yid kyi rnam par shes
pa'i mtshan nyid med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do// na ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do// sna'i 'dus
cu/ @#// tareg pa la sna'i 'dus tareg pa'i mtshan nyid med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do// lus kyi 'dus tareg pa la lus kyi
'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do// mag gi 'dus tareg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mig gi 'dus te reg pa de rkyen/

rlung gi khams kyi mtshan nyid med de// nam mkha'i khams la nam mkha'i khams kyi mtshan nyid med do// rnam par shes pa'i khams la rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid med do// ma rig pa la
ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid med do// 'du byed la 'dubyed kyi mtshan nyid medango// rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do// mang dang gzugs la ming dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid med do/

mtshan nyid med do// srid pa la srid pa'i mtshan nyid med do// skye ba la skye ba'i mtshan nyid med do// rga sha la rga shi'i mtshan nyid med do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sprone pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i

mtshan 'demed do// tshul khrims kyapha rol tu phyin pa la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyade med do// bzod pa'i rol tu phyin pa la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid yod do//

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid med do// nang stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyide kyi mtshan nyid med do// phyi stong pa nyid la phya stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do// phyi nang

stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyide med do// chen po stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do// don

'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong nyid la thog ma dang tham med

pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do// dror bamed pa stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyamtshan nyid med de// chos thams cad

stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan de med do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa stong

panyid kyi mtshan nyid med do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyimtshan nyid mad do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do// dngos po med pa'i

ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong panyid kyi mtshan nyid med do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhug pa'i mtshan nyid med de// yang dag par spong ba rnams la

yang dag par sbyong ba'i mtshan nyir med do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i mtshan nyid med do// dbang po rnams 'dabang po'i mtshan nyid med do// stobs rnams la stobs kyi
sa mtshan nyid med de// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la byang chub kyi yan lag gi mtshan nyid med do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la lam gyi mtshan nyide med do// 'phags pa'ibaden pa
rnams la 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid med do// bsam gtan rnams la bsam gtan gyi mtshan nyide med po// tshod med pa rnams la tshadamed pa'i mtshan nyid med do// gzugs med pa'i snyom
par 'jug pa rnams lagazugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid med do// rnam par thar pa rnams la rnam par thar pa'i mtshan nyid med do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
dgu la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid med do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshanam med pa dang/ smon pa med pa la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/

'bras bu'i mtshan nyid med do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshana'ang med do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i khros bu la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid
med do// dgra bcom pa nyid la dgra bcom pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do// rang byang chub la rang byang chub kyi mtshan nyid med do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi

mtha' la yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nying med do// mtshan nyid la yang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin med do// mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin la yang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin med do/

dmagos/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// dgra bcom pa nyid dgrabcom pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang ma dmigs so// rang byang chub rad byang chub
kyis stong ste/ dol skye ba yang ma dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'as pa yang mi dmigs/ byung
ba yang ma dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigasaso// tshodang ldan par
dAti'i bu de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skyab yang m dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigasaso// mnor ba de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang
mi dmags/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyisastong ste/ de la skyo ba yang ma dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigasaso/
chos nyid chos nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang ma dmigs so// chos kyi dbyingasachos kyi dbyings kyis stong ste/ del skye ba yang ma dmigs/ 'byung ba/
yang tsha dmigasaso// chos kyi gnas nyidechos kyi gnas nyid kyis stong ste/ laser ma dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigasaso// chos skyomed pa nyid chos skyon
mad pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de'askye ba yang mi mgas/ 'byubayang mi dmigasaso// yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste/ de la skyo bsang mi dmigs/ 'byung yang mi
migs te/ tshodang ldan pa shAranAti'ibu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba yin te/
de ji lta phaltararnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dbar gyur pa de lta de ltaralus yongs su dag pa dang/ ngag yongs su dag pa dang/ sams yongs su dag pa dang/ mtshan yongs su dag pa
zla thob par 'gyur ro// de ji lta ji ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang/ ngag yongs su dag pa dang/ sams yongs su dag pa dang/ mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par gyur pa de lta de ltar byang chub sem
dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do// zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems ma skyid po// gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyod do// nga rgyal dang ldan pa dang/ sgyu dang
g.yo dang ldan pa dang/ phragadog dang ser dang ldan pa dang/ srid pa dang ldan pa dang/ lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyod do// de 'dod chags kyi sems ma skyid cing/ zhe sdang dang/ gti
mug dang/ nga rgyal dang/ skya dang/ g.yo dang/ phrag dog dang/ soras dang/ sred pa dang/ lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems ma skyed pas/ nam yang ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur te/
kher zug rtag par rdzus te skye ba 'gyur/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don ma gtogs par/ nam yang ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro// de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang/

sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
par ma gyur kyi bar du ma ya ngasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// de bas na tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwati'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po yon tan dang leg

pa 'di dag thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brtson 'grus ma btang bar spyad par bya ste/ tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po shes
rab kyis rol tu phyin pa la de ltaraspyod pan/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'bar gyur pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u lnga'o//
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nyi shu dgu pa// kade nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'das gal te byang chub pems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab la rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ thabasamamakhas pas gzugs la spyod na mtshanam la spyod do//
gal te tshor bal spyod na mtshanam laspyodapo/ gal te 'du shes laspyod namtshan ma la spyod do// gal te 'du byed la spyodan mtshanam laspyod do// gal te rnam pa shes pa la spyod na mtshonam la spyod
ts+tso dodo bcom ldan 'adas gal tabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo bshesarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyod pa'i tsho/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs rtag ces bgyi ba la spyod na mtshanam la
spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs mi rtag ces bgyi bar rtsod namtshan
ma la sbyong ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ thabs ma mkhas pas gzugs bde zhes bgyi ba spyon
mtshanamo la sbyong ngo// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabasam mkhas pasagajugs sdug bsngal zhes bgyi

tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs 'amos shang 'du shes tabyin gyis rloban
de gzugs la mos shing 'du shes dbyin gyis rlob pas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de naskya ba dang/ rgya ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chib dang/ mya ngan dang/ sna
sngags 'don pa dang/ stag bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las yongasasu mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su ma 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byed
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de tshor ba la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob

dang/ 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'i grol/ sdug bsngal chenapo las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod pa'itsho/ ming dang gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te phyin gyis rlob na/ de ming dang gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyise rlob pas/ ming dang gzugs mngon
par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ sa sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug
pa las yongs suma'igrol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod de// gal tabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
pa'i tshe/ skye mched drug la mos shing 'du shes dbyin gyis rlob na/ de skye mched drug la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ sku mched drug mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod do/
de ni skye ba dang/ rgyab dang/ na ba dang/ 'chib dang/ mya ngan dang/ sa sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal bdang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las yongs sumi 'gro'/
sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal tabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achonapo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stod pa'i tsho/ rig pa la mos shing 'du
las te byin gyis rlob na/ de reg pa la mos shing 'du shes dbyen gyis rlob pas/ reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba la sdod de/ de ni sa ba dang/ rma ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang
mya ngan dang/ sngags 'don pa dang/ sdugabasngal ba dang/ yang ma bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su ma 'grol bar brjod do//
[51, ]khyu// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tsho/ tshor ba la mos shing 'du shes phyin gyis rlob na/ de tshorab
la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang/ glo ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chib dang/ chu ngan dang/ sde sngags 'don
pa dang/ sdug bsngal b.rang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las yongs su ma 'gro/ sdu la sngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal tabyang chub sems
ngapa'asems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'itsho/ srod pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de srad pa la mos shape 'dushes da byin gyis rlob pas/
srad pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang/ rgya ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'a ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ sna sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba
dang/ 'khrug pa las yongasasu ma 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol b.rab rjod do// gal po byang chub sems dang 'asems dang 'chan po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe da len pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de len pa la mos shing 'du shes tabyin gyis rlob pas/ len pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de//
[52]/de naskya ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ smra sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yang mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las yongs su ma 'grel
sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su ma 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'atshon bo shes ra bkyiyarol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ srid pa la mosashing 'du
shis te byin gyis rlob na/ de srid pa la mos shing 'du shes de byin gyis rlob pas srid pa mngon par 'du bya ba la sbyong nge/ de na skyo ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba ngang/ 'chi ba dang/
mya nganadang/ sna sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug nga las yongs su mi 'grol/ sngag bsngal chen po las yongs su cha 'grol bar
brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho 3 skyo ba la mos shing 'du shes dbyin gyis rlob na/ nge skye ba la mos shig
'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ skye ba mngonapar 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de naslu ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ smra sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug
bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su ma 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa'asaMm
dpa' chenapo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong pa'i tsho/ rgasha la mos shing 'du shes dbyin gyis rloban/ de rga sha la mos shing 'du shes phyin gyis/
slob pas/ glo sha mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ don skyo ba dang/ rga ba dang/ nabang/ 'chib dang/ mya ngan dang/ so sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/
yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las yongs sumi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su ma 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mos shing 'du shes tabyin gyis rlob na/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mos shing 'du shes te phyin
gyis rlob pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngonopar 'du bya ba la spyod dre/ de ni skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chib dang/ mya ngan dang/ stsa sngags 'don pa dang/
sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sngag bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod ngo// gal te byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyapha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'itsho/ tshul khrims kyi pha rolaM tu phyin pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rloban/ nga tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la mos shing 'du shes te kun gyis rlob pas/ tshul krams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba la sbyod de/ de ni skye ba dang/ rgabadang/ na ba dang/ 'chib dang/
myang nadang/ smra sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las yongs su ma 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/
gal tabyang chub sems dang 'asums dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de bzod pa'i
pha rol tuphyon pa 'amos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du byab la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/
mya nganadang/ sa sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ ying ma bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol// sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod
do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stong pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos shing 'du shes dbyin gyis rlob na/

de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la mos shing 'du shes 'byin gyis rlob pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba la sbyong de/ de na skyob dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang 'chi
ba ngang/ mya ngan dang/ sa sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po lA
yongs su ma 'grol bar brjod de// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sdod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos
shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba la sbyong
( ded de naskya ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ stsa sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid ma bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las yongs sum
'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal tabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha
sol tu phyin pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'amos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba
laspyod do/ de ni skya ba dang/ rna ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chib dang/ mya ngan dang/ stsa sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal bdang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las
yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/

nang stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes dbyin gyis rlob na/ denang stong pat+ti nga la mos shing 'du shes de byin gyis rlob pas/ nang stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ ro'i skya ba dang/
rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'cheg dang/ mya ngan dang/ sa sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug thesngal bdang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'brug pa 2sa po sasu mo 'grolo/ sdug bsngal
chen po las yongs su ma 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi brda srol tu phyin pa la sprod pa'i tshu/ phyi stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du/
shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de phyi stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes pa byin gyis rlob pas/ phyi stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/
'chib dang/ mya ngan dang/ stsa sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yong mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las yongs su ma 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su
mi 'grol khar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni tshe/ phyi nang stong pa nying la mos shing 'dushes te byin gyis
rlob na/ de phyi nang stong pa nyid la mos shing 'dushes te byin gyis rlob pas/ phyinang stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba
dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ stsa sngags 'don pa dang/ sdugakhasngal ba dang/ ming mi bde bdang/ 'khrug pa las longs su ma 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su
mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal tabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ stong pa zhing stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes dbyin gyisarlob
na/ de stong pa nying stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes dbyin gyis rlob pas/ stong pa nyide stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ rab dang/ 'chi
ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ sna sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal bdang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrugs las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar
brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ chapo stong pa nyid lamos shing 'du shes dbyin gyis rlob na/ de chen po stong
panyid la mos shing 'dushes te byin gyis rlob pas/ chen po stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de na skyo ba dang/ rga ba dang/ nab dang/ 'chib dang/ myang n dang/ sna
kaM/ lcags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las longs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te//
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po shes rab kyapha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes pa byin gyis rlob na/ de don dam pa stong pa nyid la/
mos shing 'dushes dbyinagyis rlob pas/ don dam pa stong pa nyidamangon par 'dubya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ stsa sngags
'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde pa dang/ 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su ma 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems
dab sems dpa' tshon po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod pa'i tsho/ 'dus byas stong panyid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du/
shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid mngonapar 'dubya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chib ngang/ mya ngan dang/ stsa sngags 'don
pa dang/ sdugakhasngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su ma 'grolabar brjod do// gal te byang chubusems
dpa' sem du sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mos shing 'dushes dbyin gyis rloban/ de 'dus ma/
byas stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa 'di mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de na skya ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chib dang/
mya ngan dang/ sa sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yade mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las yongs su ma 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su ma 'grol bar
brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes te phyin
tsan+d+ha gyis rlob na/ de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes dbyin gyis rlob pas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba laspyod do/ de na skyo bdang/
rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chib dang/ mya ngan dang/ sa sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal bdang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug
bsngal chen po las yongs su ma 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' somasadapa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tshe/ thog ma dang tha ma med paM

pa[d/ ]stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes da byin gyis rlob na/ de thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyi rlob pas/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mngon/
par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de naskya pa dang/ rga ba dang/ nab dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ smra sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug
pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su ma 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'a
srod pa'i lce/ dor ba med pastong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes dbyin gyis rloban/ de dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ dor ba mang pa stong pa nyid
mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skya ba dang/ rgya ba dang/ nab dang/ 'chib dang/ mya ngan dang/ smra sngags 'don pa dang/ sdugabasngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/
'khrug pa las yongs su ma 'grol/ sdug bsngalachen po las yongs su ma 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/
spyod nga 'tshe/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rloban/ derang bzhin stongapa nyid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mngon nga ra
'dubya ba la song ngo/ dengoskyob dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chib dang/ mya ngan dang/ sa sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba
dang/ 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod nga'i tshe/ chos thams cad stong pa de la chos shing 'du shes dbyin gyis rloban/ de chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ chos
thams cad stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chib dang/ mya ngan dang/ smasngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang//
yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngalachen po las yongs sum 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob
pa pas/ rang gi mtshan nyenge stong pa nyid mngon par 'du byab la spyod de/ de naskya ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na pa dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ smra sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal
[52 ]ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las yongs su ma 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su ma 'grol bar brjod do// gal tabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes dbyin gyis rlob na/ de ma dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes pa byin gyis rlob
pas mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba la sbyong de/ de na skyob dang/ rgo ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chib dang/ mya ngan dang/ sa sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba
dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mo'agrol rab khrodado// gal te byang chub soms dpa' sems dang kha chen po shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod pa'i tsho/ dngos po re da pa stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes pa byin gyis rlob pas/
dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'dubya ba la spyod de/ de ni skyo ba dang/ rgya bdang/ na ba dang/ 'chil ngang/ mya ngan dang/ stsa sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/
yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las yongs su ma 'grol/ sdug bsngalachen po las yongs su ma 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ ngobo nyid stong pa nyid la mos shing 'dushes te byin gyis rloban/ de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis/
rlob pas/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'dubya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang/ rgya ba dang/ na ba dang// 'chi ba dang/ mya nganadang/ stsa sngags 'donapa dang/ sdug bsngal
ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las longs su ma 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su ma 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa'asams dpa' chen

po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sdod pa'i tshe/ dngos po mang pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes me dbyen gyis rlob na/ da dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mos shing/
'du shes pa byin gyis rlob pas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo chod stong pa nying mngon par 'du bya ba la sbyong de/ de na skyo ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya nganadang/
sa sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las yongs su ma 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol khar brjod do// gal te
byang chub sems dpa'asams dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la mos shing 'du shes dbyin gyis rlob na/ de dran pa nyabar gzhag
pa bzhi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ dran pa dbar gzhag pa ba'i mngon par 'du bya ba la sbyong de/ de ni skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chib dang/ mya ngan dang
sa sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang ying mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa las yongs su ma 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su ma 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyong pa'i tshe/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de yang dag par spong ba rnams
la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ yang dag pa spong ba bzhimangon par 'du byab la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ smra sngagA
'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las yongs su ma 'grol/ sngagabasngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems

ngapa' sems drang 'tshon po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul rgyanang pa bzhi la mos shing 'dushes te byin gyis rlob na/ de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mos shing 'du
shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ sna sngags 'don
bya/ dpa dang/ sdug bsngalab dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las yongs su ma 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yo ngas su ma 'grol bar brjod do// gal te

rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la mi sbyong nge/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma la ma spyod cing/ gzugs rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs mi ga ces bya bar mi spyod//
gzugs brje zhes bya bar mospyod/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba mo spyod de/ gzugs bdag ces bya bar ma spyod/ gzugs bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs zhi
zhes bya bar mi sbyong/ gzugs tsha zhizhis bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/

midabenazhes khyabar mi spyod pa dang/ tshorab la mi skyodade/ tshor ba'i mtshan ma la mi spyod nyid/ tshor ba rtagaces bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba ma rtag cesabya bar mi spyod/ tshorab bde zhes
bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba sngagabasngal zhes bya b.ram spyod/ tshor ba bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar mospyod/ tshor bzhizhes bya bar mi
spyod/ tshor ba mazhi zhes byang r mo spyod/ tshor stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshorab mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar
mi spyod/ tshor ba snonapa lo daces byakhar ma spyod/ tshor ba snon pa med ces bya bar mo skor/ tshor ba dbenazhes bya b.ram spyod/ tshor ba mo dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang/ 'du shes
la mi spyod de/ 'dushes kyi mtshan ma la mi sbyong cing/ 'du shes rtagaces bya b.ramo spyod/ 'dushes ma rtog ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'du shes bde zhes bya bar saM spyod/ 'du shes
sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'du shes bdag ces byakhar ma spyod/ 'dushes bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dushes zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'du shes mo ni zhes bya bar mi
spyod/ 'dushesastong zhes bya bar mospyod/ 'du shes mi stong zhes bya par ma spyod/ 'du shes mtshanas yod ces bya b.ramosbyong/ 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya b.ram spyod/ 'du
shos smon pa yod ces bya b.rami spyod/ 'du shes smon pa med ces bya bar mospyod/ 'du shes dbon zhes byabam sbyor/ 'du shes ma dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang/ 'dubyed
la mi spyod de/ 'du byed kyi mtshanam la ma spyod cing/ 'du byed rtag ces bya ba ma spyod/ 'du byang mi rtag ces bya b.ram spyod/ 'du byedabang zhes bya bar ma skyod/ 'du byed sdug
bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'du byed bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'du byed bdag med ces bya'aram spyod/ 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'du byad ma zhizhes byabaram spyod de
'du byang stong nyisakhyabar ma spyod/ 'du byung ma stong zhes bya b.ram spyod/ 'du byung mtshan ma yod ces bya bar ma spyod/ 'du byed mtshan ma red ces bya b.ram spyod/ 'du byed smon pa
yong ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'du byang ston pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dubyed dbon zhes bya bar ma spyod/ 'dubyang mo dbenazhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang/ rnam par shes pa la mi
sbyong de/ rnam par shis pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing/ rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa ma rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya bar
che spyod/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ma spyod/ rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya b.ram spyod/ rnam par shes pa bdagamed ces bya bar ma spyod/ rnam par shes pa
zhizhes bya bar mo spyong/ rnam par shes pa mazhizhes bya bar maspyod/ rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa mi stong zhes bya bar mospyod/ rnam par shes pa
bya/ mtshan ma yodaces bya b.ram skyod/ rnam par shes pamtshanam med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa son pa yod ces bya bar ma spyod/ rnam par shes pa smon
pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa dben zhes byakharam spyod/ rnam par shes pa mi dbenazhes bya bar mi spyong pa dang/ mig la mi spyod de/ mig gi mtshan ma la ma slong/
cing/ mig rtag ces bya bar mi stong/ mig ma rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mag bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mig sdugakhasngal zhes bya ba ra ma spyod/ mig bdag ces bya bar ma spyod/
mig bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod mig shi zhes bya bar ma myong/ mig ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mig stong zhes bya bar ma spyod/ mig mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mig mtshanam
yod ces bya bar ma sbyong/ mag mtshan ma med ces bya ba mi spyod/ mogasmon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ migasmon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mig dbenazhes bya bar mi spyod//
wa mig mi dbenazhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang/ rna ba lam spyong re/ rna ba'i mtshan ma la mi spyod tsang/ rna brtag ces bya bar mi sbyong/ rna ba mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba bde zhes
bya bar ma spyod/ rnab sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba bdag ces bya bar ma spyod/ rnab bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba zhi zhes bya bar mospyod/ rna bam zhi zhes bya bar
mo da/ rnabastong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnab ma stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnab mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rna bson pa yod
cas bya bar maM spyod/ rna ba snon pa med ces bya b.ram spyod/ rnab dpon zhes bya bar ma spyod/ rna bam dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang/ stsa latsaspyod de/ sna'i mtshan ma la mi
spyod cing/ sna rtagaces bya bar mi spyod/ sna mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ sna bde zhes byar ma myong/ sna sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ma spyod/ sna bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/

ces bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma mad ces bya bar maskyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa yod ces bya bar ma sbyong/ bzod pa'i pha rol tuphun pa
smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dbenazhes bya bar mi stong/ bathong nga 'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dbonazhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi tha
rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ brtson 'grus kyi snga rol tu phyin pa'i ma tshanam la mi spyod cing/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tuphyin pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'gras kyi
rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar ma srid/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tuphyin pa bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha col tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha ro'o tuphyin pa bdag me ngaces bya bar mi spyong/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ brtson
'grus kyipha rol tu phyin pa ma zhes bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi stong zhes bya bar mospyod/ brtson
'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma yod ces byabar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar ma sbyong/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa yong ces bya
bar mi spyod/ brtson 'gros kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa mi draces bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'gras kyi rol tu phyin pa drabenazhes bya bar sbyong/ brtson 'grus kyis rol 'dzin pa mi dger
zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi sbyongado/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshams spyod cing/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu u0f7cna pa rtag ces
bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa martag ces bya bar mi sbyor/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ange zhes bya bar mi spyong/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal
zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya ba mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan pha rol tu phyin pa
mizhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tuphyin pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tuphyin pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
stong zhes bya bar mi spyor/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshanam yos bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyong/
bsam gtanargyupha rol tu phyin pa ston pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tuphyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbenazhes bya bar/
ma sbyong/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma dpe zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma sbyong de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha lol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab
kyi pha rol tuphyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya b.ram spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya bar ma spyod/ sher rab kyi pha rol phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pam zhes bya bar ma spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi
stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa ston pa yong ces bya bar mi sbyor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa medaces bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbanazhes bya bar yod/ shes rab kyi
rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bya bar ma spyod pa dang// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po sum cudrug pa/// nang stong pa

nying la mi spyod nge/ nangastongapanyid kyi mtshanam la mi spyod cing/ nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid mi rtag ces byakharam spyod/ nang stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar
mi sbyong/ nang stong pa nyid sdugabasngal zhes bya b.ram spyod/ nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar maspyodo/ nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi
spyod/ nang stong par ma zhes bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nying mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong nyidamtshanam yod ces bya bar mispyod
nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid smonapa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nying sonapamed ces bya bar spyod/ nang stong pa nyid dben zhesabya bar ma

sbyong/ nang stong pa ting mi dpenazhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang/ phyi stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma lami spyod cing/ phyistong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong
nga nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid bdazhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar ni
spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar ma spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi stong/ phyi stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya par mi sbyor/ phyi stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi stod/

phyi stong pa nyid ma stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid mtshan ma yong ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid smonapa yodacos bya

zlo bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar ma spyod/ phyi stong pa de dban zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid mi deban zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la

ma sbyong do/ phyinang stong pa nyid kyi mtshanam la mi spyod cing/ phyi nang stong pa nying rtagaces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya par mi stod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bde zhes
bya bar mi spyod/ phyinang stong pa nyang sdugabasngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stod pa nyid bdag ces bya ba mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag mang ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyinAng stong

panyid zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stongar zhing stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid mi stong zhwabya ba mi spyod/ phyi nang
stong pa nyidamtshan ma yod ces bya b.ram spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid smonapa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid ston pa
mad ces bya bar ma song/ phyi nang stong pa rtong dben zhes bya b.ram sbyong/ phyi nang stong pa nying mo dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mi sbyong de/ stong
pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyidi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nying mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid stong pa zhing
bde zhes bya bar ro sbyong/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyidabangag ces bya bar mi stod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces
bya bar mi spong/ stong panying stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar ma sbyong/ stong pa de stong pa nyid ma zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ma sdod/ stong pa
stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stongopa nying mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi sbyong/ stong pa nyid stong pa nying mtshan ma med ces bya bar ma srid/ stong pa nyid stong pa
nying snon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong la nyengasmon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya b.rami spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dben
sum rgya nga brgyad
zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang/ chen po stongang nyid la mi spyodade/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshanam lami spyod cing/ chen po stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/
chen postong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid bdag ces bya
bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyide bdagemadaces bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nying zhi zhis bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar ma myong/ chen po stong pa nyid stong
zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chenapo stong pa nyid ma stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nying mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/
chen po stong pa nyid ston pa yod ces phyabar ma da/ chen po stong pa nyid ston pa mod ces bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid ma dbenazhes
bya bar mi spyod pa dang/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la ma stong da/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing/ don dam pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ don dam pa stong
bar mi spyod/ donadam pa stong pa nyid bdag mdaces bya bar mi spyod/ donadam pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyidam zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ don dam pa stong
pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ma spyod don dam pa stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya b.ram spyod don dam pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar ma spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid mtshanam mang
ces bya bar mi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid son pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ donadam pa stong pa nying dbamazhes bya bar mi spyong
don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dbenazhes bya bar ma spyod pa dang/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyodacing/ 'dus byas stong pa nyidaM
rtagaces bya bar mi spyod ! 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi rtag cesakhya bar mo spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyide badro zhes bya bar mo sbyod/ 'dus byas stongopa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi

bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid mtshanamamedaces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid smon pa
mod ces bya ba'am spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dbenazhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nying mo dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang/ 'dusazhi byas stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/
'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la ma spyod cing/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyidortag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyiram rtaganyis bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong
pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyidisdug bsngal zhes bya bar ma spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag
med ces bya pa ra mospyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid na zhes bya ba mo spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nying ma zhu zhes byakhar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pad stong zhes bya bar mi
spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyidamaM stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong ba nyid mnam yod ces bam spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces
byabar ma spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus mkhyas stong ba nyid dbenazhes
bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mdabenazhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid lam spyod de/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma
la ma spyod cing/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rtagaces bya bar mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar ma spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bde
zhes byakhor mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyade sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ma spyod/ mtha' laMs 'das pa stong panyid bdag ces bya bar mospyod/ mtha' las 'das pa
stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar maspyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mazhi zhes bya bar maspyod/ mtha' las
'das pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma stong zhes bya bar maspyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtshanam yod ces bya bar mi spyod/
mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ston pa yod cesabya bar ma spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyidisnyan
pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stopa nyidadabenazhes bya bar mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong panyid ma deben zhes byakhar ma spyod pa dang/ thog ma dang
tha ma mdapa stong pa nyid lam skyod de/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la ma spyod cing/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi
spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi rtagacosabya bar ma spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bde zhas bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tham med pa stong pa nyid sdug
bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod : thog ma dang tha ma

med pa stong pa nying zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dad
tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar ma spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces
bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyidesmon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tham med pa stong pa nyide son pamang nyes bya bar mospyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa
stong pa nyid dben zhes bya b.ramaspyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma dben zhes bya par mi spyod pa dang/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la ma sbyong de/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
kyimtshan ma la mi spyod cing/ ngor bamed pa stongar tide rtag cesabyabar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma rtag ces bya b.ramo sod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya barmi
spyod/ dor ba med pa stong bting sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod//
do'i bamed pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma gzhes byabar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
mi stong zhes bya bar mospyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar ma sbyong/ doT ba med pa stong pa nyid mchon ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
smonapa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid smonapa med ces bya bar mo spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi
dbon zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mi sbyong de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtshanam la ma spyod cing/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mospyod/ rang bzhin
stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya b.ram spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya b.rami spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag ces bya/
param spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag medaces bya bar mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid zhizhes bya bar mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nying ma zhu zhes bya bar mi
spyod/ rang bzhin stong panyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyide ma stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rang bzhin
stong pa nying mtshanamamodaces bya bar mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ston pa yod ces bya bar ma spyod/ rang bzhin stong panyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid
dpin zhes bya bar ma spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mdaban zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang/ chos thoms cad stong pa nyid lam spyod re/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod/
cing/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid rtagacos bya bar mi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar ma spyod/ chos
thams cad stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag ces bya pa ra ma spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag mod ces bya bar mi spyong/ chos thamA

cad stong panyid zhis byakhar mi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid mazhizhes bu bar ma spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba la ni khyod/chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma stong zhes bya
bar la spyod/ chos thams cad stongs nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyidamtshan ma med ces bya b.ram sbyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ston pa yod sa
bya bar mi stod/ chos thams cad stong pa nying smon pamad sa bya bar mi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben zhes bya b.ramo spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya
bar mi spyod pa dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la ma spyod de/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mosbyong cing/ rang gi mtshanang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi
sdod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma rtagaces bya bar ma stod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdugabasngal zhes bya bar mi
