rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar ma spyong/ rong gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ma spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma stong zhes bya bar mospyod/ rang gi
mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtshanam yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong panyidamtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyong/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba'am
sbyod/ rang gi mtshananyid dpyod pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rang gi mtshananyid stongapatid mi
dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang/ mi dmigs la song pa nyidal mi spyod de/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/
ma dmigs pa stong pa'adi mi rtag ces bya kharam spyod/ mi dmigapa pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mospyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa 'di sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi dmigs pastod
padi bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bdag mod ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya b.ramaspyod/ mi dmags pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya/
bar ma spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa ting stongashes bya b.ramaspyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid lostong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ma dmigs pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/
thom ramigs pa stong pa nying mtshan ma med ces ba bar ma spyod/ mi dmagres pa stong pa nyid ston pa yo'us bya bar mi spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong par stonapamed ces bya bar mi skor/
I/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ma dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma dben zhis bya bar mi spyod pa dang/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mo spyod de/ dngos po med pa stong
pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la ma spyod cing/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bde zhes
bya b.ram spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bdagaces bya bar mi spyong/ dngos po med pa stong pa nying bdag medaces
byabar ma myong 3 dngos po med pa stong pa nying zhizhis bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po mang pa stong pa nyid stongazhes bya bar mi spyod/
dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mtshanam yod ces bya b.ram spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mospyod/
dngos po med pa stong patir ston pa yod ces bya bar ma song/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya b.ramo song/ dngos po mang pa stong pa 'di ston pa yod ces bya bar mi
sbyor/ dngos po mang pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa zhing dbon zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyidi mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod
pa dang/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mo spyod de/ ngobo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la ma sbyodaching/ ngo bo nyid stong pa 'ong rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces
bya bar mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya b.ram spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi
sbyor/ ngo bo nyid stong pa de bdag med ces bya bar mi srid/ ngo bo nyid stong pa ring zhizhes bya bar mi srid/ kho nyid stong pa nyid ma zhes bya bar mi stod/ ngobed stong pa nyid stong zhes
bya b.ram spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ngo po stong stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshanam med ces bya bar mi spyod/
ngo bo de stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ ngo bo 'od stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar ma spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar ma sbyong/ ngo loring stong pa 'ong mi
dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ma sdong de/ dngos po chod pa'i depo nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyide stong pa/

nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po mdapa'i nge bo de stong pa nyid bdazhes bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po mang nga 'i ngo bo 'di

stong pa nyidasdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mospyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa'i
na/ ngo bo nyid/ stong pa nying zhes bya bar ma stod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo de stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo ring stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ma sbyor//

dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma song zhes bya bar ma sbyong/ dngos po mang pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nying mtshan ma yod ces bya bar ma sbyong/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
mtshanam med ces bya b.ramaspyod/ dngos po med pa'i re bod stong pa nyid ston pa yod cesabya b.ram spyod/ dngos po mang nga'i re bo nyid stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/
dngos po med pa'i ngo bo de stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po mang pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma dben zhes bya bar mospyod pa dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi
spyod de/ dran pa bar gzhag pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya par mi spyod/ dAn pa dbar gzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar
mi sbyor/ dran pa 2bar gzhag pa rnams bde zhes bya bar ma spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhug pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ma spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhug pa rnams bdag ces
bya bar mi sbyong/ dranapa bar gzhag pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa dbar gzhag pa rnams mazhi zhes bya bar
mospyod/ dranapa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong zhes bya bar ma spyod/ dran pa nye bgazhag pa rnamasam stong tshes bya bar mospyod/ dran dbar gzhag pa rnams mtshan
ma yodacas byabar mi spyod/ dranapa bar gzhag pa rnams mtshanam mdaces bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye b.ragazhag pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya b.ram spyod/ dran pa nye b.ragazhag pa/
rnamasasonapamed ces bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nyibar gzhag po rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhug pa rnams mi dbenazhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang/ yang dag par spong/
b rnams la ma spyod// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mtshanam la mi spyod cing/ yang dag par spong ba rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par slongab rnams mi rtag ces bya par
ma spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams bange zhes bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par song ba rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par slong ba rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/
yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnamasazhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par stong pa rnams mazhizhes bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par
slong ba rnams stong zhes bya ba ma spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par slong ba rnams mtshanam yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba/
[j]masamtshanam med ces bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par slong ba rnams smyon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par sbyong b rnams smon pa mad ces bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par song ba/
rnams dbenazhes bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par song ba rnams mo dbenazhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mi spyod de/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi mtshanam/
la mi spyod cing/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rtag cesabya bar mo da/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi rtagaces bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyiskang po rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod//
rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ma spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu/

'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhizhes bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam
ma stong zhes bya b.ram spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang parnamasamtshanam yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnamA
smon pa yod ces bya baoM spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams smon pamed ces bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dbenazhes bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams /
ma dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang/ dbang po rnams lam spyod do/ dbang po rnams kyi mtshanama'am spyod cing/ dbang po rnams rtag cesabya bar mi spyod//
dbang po rnams martag ces bya b.ramo spyod/ dbang po rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams bdagaces bya bar mi spyod/
dbang po rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams mnizhes bya b.rami spyod/ dbang po rnams stong zhes bya par mi spyod/ dbang
po rnamasami stong zhes bya bar ma spyod/ dbang po rnams mtshanam yod ces bya bar ma spyod/ dbang po rnams mtshan ma medaces bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams smyon pa yod ces bya bar mi
spyod/ dbang po rnams ston ba mod ces bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnamasam dben zhes byakhar ma spyod pa dang/ stobs rnams la mi
spyod de/ stobs rnams kyimtshanas lam spyod cing/ stobs rnams rtagaces bya ra ma spyod/ stobs rnams mi rtag ces bya b.ram sbyod/ stobs rnams bde zhes bya bar mi
spyod/ stobs rnams sdug bsngalazhes bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams bdag ces bya b.ram spyod/ stobs rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams zhizhes
bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams gzhis bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnamasastong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams ma song zhes bya bar ma spyod/ stobs rnams mtshan ma yod/
sa bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor/ stobs rnams smonapa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnamasasmon pa med ces bya bar spyod/ stobs
rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams ma dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang/ byang chub kyi yan laga rnams la mi spyod de/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi mtshan ma la
mistod cing/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ par chub kyi yan lag rnams bde zhes bya bar mi
spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ma spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag med ces bya bar
mi stod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mospyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byang
chub kyi yan lag rnams ma stongazhes bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan laga rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod
byang chub kyi rnams smonapa yodaces bya bar ma spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams son pa med ces bya b.ram spyod/ byang chub kyiyan lag rnams dben/
zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnamasam dbenazhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang/ 'phags pa'ilam yan lag brgyad pa la mi spyod de/ 'phag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i
mtshanam la mi spyod cing/ 'phagatsapal lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bya'am spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma rtog ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i
lam yan lag brgyud pa bde zhes bya bar mi skyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag ces bya bar
mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pazhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
pa ma zhi zhis bya bar mospyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i mayan lag brgyad pa mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyong/ 'phags pa'i lam
yan lag brgyadapa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stson pa
yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa son pa med ces bya bar ma spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i
lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dbenazhes bya ba'am spyod pa dang/ 'phags pa'i bdenapa rnams la mi spyod de/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mtshanam la mi spyod cing/ 'phags
pa'i bden pa rnams rtag cesabya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i
bden pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes byabaramo spyod/ 'phags pa'i pan pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag med sa byabarami spyod//
'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhi zhes byabar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bdenapa rnamasam zhizhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'ibaden pa rnams stong zhes byakhar mo spyod/ 'phags
ba'i bden pa rnams ma stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i brdzenapa rnams mtshanam yodaces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnamasamtshanamamedacos byakhar ma spyod/
'phags pa'i bden pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mospyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dbenazhes bya bar mo
sbyor/ 'a thogs pa'ibaden pa rnams mi di bzhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang/ bsam gtana rnams la sbyod de/ bsam gtan rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing//
bsam gtan rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyong/ bsam gtan rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya
bar ma spyod/ bsam gtana rnams bdagaces khyabar ma spyod/ bsam gtan rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams zhi zhes bya bar ma spyod/ bsam gtan rnamA
ma ni zhes bya bar ma spyod/ bsam gtan rnams stongazhes bya bar ma spyod/ bsam gtan rnams mi stong zhes bya bar ma spyod/ bsam gtan rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/
bsam gtan rnams mtshanam med ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams snon pa yod ces bya bar ma spyod/ bsam gtan rnams smon pa mer ces bya bar ma spyod/ bsam gtan
rnams dpon zhes bya b.rAmi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams ma dbenazhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang/ tshad med pa rnams la mi spyod de/ tshad med pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing/ tshad
mang po rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod tshad med pa rnams ma rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshadamed pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mospyod/ tshad med pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/
tshang med pa rnams bdag ces bya bar ma spyod/ tshang med pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar ma spyod/ tshad med pa rnams zhizhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/
tshang med pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi skyod/ tshad med pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshangamed pa rnams mtshanam yod ces bya bar mi spyod 2 tshad med pa rnamasamtshanam mdacesal
bar ma spyod/ tshad med pa rnams mon pa yod ces bya bar maspyod/ tshad med pa rnams stsonapa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams dbenazhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams
mdabenazhis bya b.ramo spyod pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'a ma spyod de/ gzugasamod pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la ma spyod cing/ gzug
med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya bar ma spyod/ gzugs med pa'i soms par 'jug pa rnams ma gces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugamed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
bde zhes bya bar mi spyod 3 gzugasamad pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod//
gzugasamed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag medaces bya ba mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhazhis bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar ma spyod/ gzugasamad pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya b.ram spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnamasamaM
stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'isnyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spong/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshon ma med ces bya bar
mi sbyong/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnamasasmon pa yod ces bya bar mi sbyong/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar ra spyod/
gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rabezhes bya bar mi stod/ gzugs yod pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma dben zhes bya bar mi sprod pa dang/ rnam par thar pa rnamA
la mi sbyong de/ rnam par tharapa rnams kyi mtshanam la mi spyod cing/ rnam par thar pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi sbyong/ rnam par thar pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par
tharapa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams bdag
med ces byakhar mi spyod rnam par thar pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mo spyod rnam par thar pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod rnam par thar pa rnams stong zhes bya bar ma sbyong/ rnam pa
thar pa rnams ma stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar ma spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa//
rnamasasmon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyodo/ rnam par thar pa rnams smon pa medaces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams mi dben
zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams lam sbyor ngo/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshanam la mi spyod cing/
mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa pa'ajug pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi sod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bde zhes bya b.rami spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ma spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
nga ra 'jug pa rnams bdag ces byapar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar mospyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa 'i snyoms par 'ajug pa
rnams zhizhes bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa 'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma ni zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi
spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar ma spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma yod kyis/
bya bar ma sbyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mo spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi
sbyong/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams smon pa med ces bya b.ram spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dbenazhes bya bar ma sbyong/ mthar
kyis gnas pa'i snyoms 'jug pa rnams ma dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang/ rnam pa ro thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa la ma spyod de/ rnam
par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nying dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i mtshanam la ma spyod cing/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ stson pa
mang pa rtag ces bya bar ma spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshanam mdapa dang/ smon pa med pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi stong/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smonapa med pa bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang 2 smon pa med pa sdug bsngalazhes bya bar mi spyod/
rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ rtson pa med pa bdag ces bya b.ram spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshanan med pa rang/ smon pa med/
pa bdag med ces bya b.ram spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nying ngang/ mtshanam med pa dang/ smon pa med pa zhi zhis bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dad/

mtshanamamang pa dang/ smon pa med pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshanaman dpa dad smon pa med pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
mtshan ma med pa dang/ snon pa med pa mistong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshanamamed pa dang/ smon pa med ba mtshanam yod ces bya bar ma spyod/ rnam
par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa mang pa mtshanam mad ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ son pamed
pa son pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod ) rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa re
ngang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa 'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa mi dbenazhes bya bar mi spyod pa/
dang 3 mngonar rashes pa rnams la ma rtsod de/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing/ mngon par shes pa rnams rtagaces bya bar mi spyod//
mngon par shes pa rnams maN+Dagaces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bya bar ma spyod/ mngon pa shes ba rnams sdugabasngal zhes bya b.ram sbyong/ mngon par shes
tsa pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shis pa rnams mnyi
zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mngon pa ra shes pa rnams mo snying zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnar sa mtshanam yod ces bya ba
mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams ston pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar
mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams dben zhes bya bar ma sbyong/ mngon par shes pa rnams ma debenazhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la mi spyod de/ ting nge 'dzin rnamA
kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing/ ting nge 'dzina rnams rtags bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mi rtag ces bya bar ma spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bde zhes bya bar ma spyod/ dang
de 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya ba mispyod da tade nge 'dzin rnams bdag ces bya bar spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi sod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams zhizhes
bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mi stong zhesal bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams
mtshanam yod ces bya b.ram sbyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshanam mad ces bya b.rami spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams smyon pa yod ces bya b.ramospyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams smon pa med
ces bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dbenazhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi spyod de/ gzungs

srong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// skye ba'i stongapa nyid gang yin pa de yang skye bam yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang slob med/ skye ba las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang skye ba/ skye ba'i

kyang stong pa nyid do// rga shi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang shi ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gungan yang rga sha med/ rga shi las gudanayang stongapa nyid mdado/ stong pa nyid kyang rga shi/ rga shi nyidikyang

[stong pa nyid do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las chung na yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa

las gungan yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang spyan pa'i pha ro' tu phyinapo/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pade yang tshul

khrimA kyi pha rol tuphyin pa ma yani/ stong pa nyid lasakung na yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tuphyin pa long/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gudanayang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrimA kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pam yin/ stong pa nyid las gung na yang bzod pa'i dra

rol tu phyin payod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gudan yang stong pa nyid mad de/ stong pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// brtson 'grus kyi

phalol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gung na yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tuphyin pa mod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las dud

na yang stong pa nyidi med de/ stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tuphyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de
yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tuphyin pa ma yin/ stong nyid las gud nayang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gung na yang stong nyid med

de stongapa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/

pam yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ sa rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ shes bar

tshe kyi pha rol tu phyinab nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// nang stong pa nyid kyi stong nyid gang yin pa de yang rang stong pa zhing ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang nang stong pa nyid red/ nang stong pa'ongal sa gud na yod

stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid/ nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang phyi stong pa nyid ma yani/ stong pa nyid las nyung na yang phyi stong pa ni

med/ phyi stong pa nyid las gung na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// phyinang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang phyi nang stong pa nyid ma

yin/ stong pa nyid las chung na yang phyi nang stong pa nyid mod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid las gudan yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyide ngo

[stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang stong pa nyang stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gung na yang stong pa de stong pa nyid med/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gung na yang stong pa nyid

mad de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid stongapa nyid kyang stong pa nyid de// chen po stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang chen po stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las

gung na yang chen po stong pa nyid med/ chonapo stong pa nyid las gudan yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi

stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ stongapa nyid la sa gud na yang don dam pa stong pa nyape mod/ don dam pa stong panyid las chung na yang stong panyid med de/ stong pa

nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid/ donadam pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyide las gung nayang
'dus byas stong pa nyid med/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid las gud nAyang stongapa nyid med do/ stong pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas
stopatadikyi stong pa nyid gang yin pade yang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med/ 'dusam byas stong ba nyid las nyung na yang stong pa/
@#/ nying mang de/ stongapa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang/
mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gung na yang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gung na yang stong pa 'di med de/ stong pa nyid

ts+tshA kyang mthang las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid

ma yin/ stong pa nyid la sa gung na yang thog ma dang tha ma me dang stong pa nyid med/ thog ma dang tham med pa stong pa nyid las gun yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang thog ra dang tha ma med pa stong pa

nyid/ thog ma dang thu mamed pa stong nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// dor bamed pastong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las nyung na yang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid

y+Yo med/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyidamed de/ stong pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa leng kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de

paN+Ti di yang rang bzhin stong pa nyidi ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang rang bzhin stong pa nyidemed/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gung na yang stong pa nyid mang de/ stong pa nyid kyang rang nyistong pa nyid/ rang bzhin stong

ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// chos tham cad stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las nyung na yang chos thams cad stong pa nyid med/ chos tham cad stong pa/

nyid las gung nayang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang chos thams cad M stong pa nyid/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshananyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa de gang yin pa de yang

rad gamtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gu nayang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nying med/ rang gi mtshan ri stong pa nying las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan

nyid stong pa nyid/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang song pa nyid do// dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gang na yang mi

migs pa stong pa nyid mod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nying mod de/ stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// dngos po med/

ba stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyidagungayin pa de yang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gung na yang dngos po mdapa stong pa nyid med/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las gud nayang stong pa nyid med

du stong pa nyid kyadadangos po med pa stong pa nyid/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang ngobo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid lha

gung na yang ngo bo de stong pa nyid med/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// dngos

po med pa'i ngo bo 'de stong ba nyid kyi stongang nyingegang yin pa de yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyidi skyod pa'id rang/ dngos po med pa'i

ngo btade stong pa nyid las gur nayang stong pa nyid med de/ stongapa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo 'de stong pa nyid/ dngos po mang pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhug pa bzhi'i

stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang dran pa bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid la sa gud na yang dran pa la bar gzhag pa rnams mad/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gung na yang stong pa nyid med

ngo stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhug pa// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// yang dag pa spong ba bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yan pa de yang yang dag par spyong ba rnams ma yin/ stong
panyid las gung nayang yang dag par spong ba rnams med/ yang dgupa song ba rnams las gud nayang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par srong ba/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang stong

panyid do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i stongapanyid gang yin pa de yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yone/ stong pa nyid las chung na yang rdzu 'phrulagyi rkang pa rnams med/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams

las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyiskang pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// dbang po lnga'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang dbang po rnamasam yin/

stong pa de las gud na yang dbang po rnams med/ dbang po rnams las gung na yongastong pa nyid dang de/ stong pa nyid kyang rab ng po// dbang po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stobs lnga'i stong pa nyid gang yani
pa de yang stobs rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las nyung na yang stobs rnams med/ stobs rnams las gung na yang stong pa 'dem de/ stong pa nyid kyang stobs/ stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// byang
chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnamasam yin/ stong pa nying las gung na yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las

gunganayang stong pa nyid medade/ stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa'i stong pa'id gang yin pa de yang 'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gung na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong
pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lagabargyad pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brkyang pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid ngo// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang 'phags pa'i bden
pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang 'phags pa'i bdenaparnamasamad/ 'phags 'ibadenapa rnams las gud nayang stong pad mod de/ stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i
bden pa/ 'phags pa'i bdenang nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// bsam gtan rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang bsam gtan rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gung na yang bsam gtan rnams med/

bsam gtan rnams las gud na yang stong pa de med de/ stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan/ bsam gtan nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// tshad med pa bzhi'i stong pa rting gang yin pa de yang tshang mad pa rnamasam
yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang tshad med pa rnamasamed/ tshad med pa rnams las gung na yang stong pa nyid med de 1 stong pa nyid kyang tshad med pa/ tshad mdapi nga kyang stong pa nyid do//
gzugasamod pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gung na yang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
za'ajug pa med/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med do/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par

'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rnam par thar pa mayin/ stong pa nyid las gud nayang rnam par thar pa med/ rnam par thar pa las chung

na yang stong pa nyid med de 3 stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa/ rnam par thar pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i stong pa de gang yin pa de yang mthar/
gyis gnas pa'i soms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gung na yang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid do// rnam par thar pa'isgo
stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa ma yin/ stong par
las gung na yang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang 2 son pa med pa las gur na yang
stong pa nyape med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshanam med pa dang/ smon pa med pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyidadang/ mtshanam med pa dang/ ston
med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// mngon par shes pa drug gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gudan yang mngon par shes pa rnams med/ mngon[4]
@#/ par bs pa rnams las gung na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang mangon pajashes pa rnams / mngon par shes pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi

stong pa nyid gang yin pa de btang ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang ting nge 'dzin rnams med/ ting nge 'dzin rnams las gud nas da stong pa nyidimad de/ stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin/
ting nge 'dzin rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi dga' stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams med/

gzungs kyi sgo rnams las khung na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams / gzungs kyi sgo rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa
de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gudan yang de bzhAn gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las nyung na yang stong pa nyid med de/

ba stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'istobs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa deyang ma 'jigs pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las
gud na yang m 'jigs pa rnamasamed/ mi 'jigs pa rnams las khunganayang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyide mi 'jigs pa/ mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// soso yang dag par rig pa
bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang soso yang dag par rig pa rnams mayin/ stong pa nyid las gu dan yang soso yang dag par rig pa rnams med/ soso yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na yang/
stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyasoso yang ngag par rig pa/ soso yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// byams pa chen po'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang byams pa chen pom ni//

stong pa de las gud na yang byams pa chen po med/ byams pa chen po las gudanayang stong pa nyide med do/ stong pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po/ byams pa chen po de kyang stong pa nyid do// snying rje chas/

po'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang snying rjechen po ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang snying rje chen po med/ snying rdzachen po las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang snying rje/
chen bo/ snying rjechenapo nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid
las gung na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gungan yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sas rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid/
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// thams cad shes pa nyid kyistong panyid gang yin pa de yang thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang thams cad
shes bzhadamar 'amasacashes pa nyid las gudan yastong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang thams cad shes nyid/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/
do lam gyi rnam pa sa bkigyi stong nyid gangayin pa de yang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa [)]nga ma yin/ stong pa nyid las khungan yang lam gyinam pa shes pa nyid med/ lam gyi rnam pa
shes pa nyid las gunganayang stong pa nyidached do/ stong pa nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid/ lam rgyarnam pa shes pa nyide kyang stong pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapanyid kyi stong
pa'ang gang yin pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang m pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gudan yang
stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid de// tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
dbal chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la de ltar sbyodapa ni thabs mkhas par shes bar bya'o// tshodang ldan pa' rad ti'i bu byang chub soms dpa' sems dpa' chen po
wA ]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltaraspyod pa ni/ blonamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba yod do// khyadachusems dpasems dpa' chen po

0/de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang sbyong do zhes bya bar mi dmigs so// ma sbyong do zhes bya b.ramo de mig so// spyod kyang sbyong la mi spyod kyang ma spyod ces bya b.ram dmagasaso// spyod pa
yang ma yin/ mi spyod pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar mi dmigs so// sharadwa ti'i bus smasal/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byoraci'i phyir na/ byang chub semasadapa'asems dpa' chen po shes rab/
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/ mi sbyod ces bya bar yang mi dmags/spyod kyang srong la mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar yang ma ngomigs//
spyod pa yang ma yin/ ma spyod pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba yang ma dmigs pa ma yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa// tshodang ldan pa shAr te'i bu de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang
bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltarashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te/ tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ spyod do zhes bya bar yang ma dmigs so// mi sbyong ngo zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so// spyod kyang
spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod ngo zhes bar yang ma dmigs so// spyod pa yang ma yin/ mi skyod pa yang m yin nozhes bya bar yang m ngamigasaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos thams
ka/ @#/ cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du 'ongadu chud de ma blangs pa'i phyir ro// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltarashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
pa'i tshasems zhum pa med cing yongs su zhum pa med do/ mi 'jigasam sdang skrag pa mi 'gyur na/ tshe dang ldan pa'ar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bar gyur par shes par bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de yang chos thams cad dngos po mad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar
med pa ste/ do ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba ste/ rgya chab mchog tubya ba/ tshad med par nges pa/ nyan
thos dang rang sangs rgyas thamasacad kyis mi 'phrogs pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur dubla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin 'di 'ba' zhig gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' soms dpa' chen po myur du blunamed pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya 'am/ 'on tam de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag kyang yong/ rab 'byor gyisasmras pa/ tshodang ldan pa shAr dz+wa ti'i bu ting de 'dzinagazhan
[zj]ngag la rnam par sbyod pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo mur du bla namadapa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de da do//
smas pa/ tshadang ldan pa rab 'byobang nge 'dzinagazhan gang gis rnam par sbyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dumangon
